207a4('dul ba): la mchis nas zhag drug las 'das par bgyis na/ cir 'gyur/ spang bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis khyim gyi nang du gos bzhag par gyur la/ gos de dang zhag drug las 'das par
207a5('dul ba): bral ba na/ de'i mtshan 'phos te dge slong mar gyur na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong mas khyim gyi nang du gos bzhag par gyur la/ gos de dang zhag drug las 'das par bral ba na/
207a6('dul ba): de'i mtshan 'phos te dge slong du gyur na/ cir 'gyur/ spang bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal pas zhag drug las 'das par bral na/ cir 'gyur/ spang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong mas bral
207a7('dul ba): na ni/ nyes byas so/ /dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma la yang nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ dge tshul phas zhag drug las 'das par bral na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so// //'dul ba gzhung
207b1('dul ba): dam pa/ bam po lnga pa/ mdor na/ 'phrin pa spring yig lag brda dang / /gzhan zer ba dang gcig nas gcig /smyon par gyur dang sems 'khrugs dang / /nad pa 'on pa glen pa'o/ /gnyid log ra ro myos pa

207b3('dul ba): lam| shin tu ring du bcangs na/ spang bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis dbyar gyi ras chen 'phrin pa las myur du btsal te ras rnyed na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /shin tu ring
207b4('dul ba): bar bcangs na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /'phrin pa las ji lta ba de bzhin du spring yig dang / lag brda dang / gzhan zer ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnams so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis smyon pa

207b6('dul ba): gzir ba dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / ra ro ba dang / myos pa dang / snyoms par zhugs pa dang / de bzhin du 'di las phyi rol gyi mu stegs can dge sbyong gzhan bram ze dang / spyod
207b7('dul ba): pa ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba rnams las btsal ba dang / de bzhin du 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa las shin tu myur bar btsal te rnyed na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /shin tu ring bar bcangs na yang nyes byas
208a1('dul ba): su 'gyur ro/ /mdor na/ mi rung ba dang de bzhin mtshan/ /thun mong bdun pa de bzhin te/ /mchog pa dang seng ras dang / /bzhi pa dang yang dge slong ma'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong

241a3('dul ba): sum du khyim pa zhig skrod du stsal na/ cir 'gyur/ ltung ba'o/ /de bzhin du za ma dang / ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha dang / ma dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / de
241a4('dul ba): bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang / rkun gnas dang / so sor gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dang / sngar 'khrugs
241a5('dul ba): pa dang / sngar nyes pa byung ba dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal ba dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma dang / dge tshul phas skrod du stsal na/ cir 'gyur/
241a6('dul ba): ltung ba'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong ma zhig gis dge slong ma bskrad dam/ skrod du stsal na/ cir 'gyur/ ltung ba'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong mas dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma dang / dge
241a7('dul ba): tshul pha rnams bskrad dam/ skrod du stsal na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal bas dge slong ma zhig bskrad dam/ skrod du stsal na/ cir 'gyur/ ltung ba'o/ /
241b1('dul ba): dge slong ma dang / dge tshul ma dang / dge tshul pha rnams la nyes byas so/ /mdor na/ smyon pa sems 'khrugs na ba dang / /'on pa glen pa gnyid log dang / /ra ro ba dang myos pa dang / /snyoms
241b2('dul ba): zhugs 'gro ba tha ma 'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang gis snga na mchis pa'i dge slong la
241b3('dul ba): slad kyis mchis te shin tu gnod par bgyid cing mchis sam/ nyal bar bgyid na/ ltung ba'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis dge slong smyon pa zhig la shin tu gnod par
241b4('dul ba): bgyid cing mchis sam/ nyal bar bgyid na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa dang /

241b6('dul ba): cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /mdor na/ gang zag gi dang dge 'dun gyi/ /de bzhin mtshan dang bzhi pa dang / /khyim pa dag la sogs pa rnams/ /mi rung ba ni tha mar gyur/ /btsun pa/ dge slong
241b7('dul ba): gis gang zag gi gtsug lag khang na snga na mchis pa'i dge slong rnams la shin tu gnod par bgyid cing mchis sam/ nyal bar bgyis na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ dge

260b6('dul ba): pa la gos ma mchis par 'du shes te mgron du bos pa slad ma 'tshal na/ cir 'gyur/ ltung ba'o/ /gos med pa la gos dang bcas par 'du shes te zos na/ nyes pa med do/ /gos dang bcas pa la gos med par

266b3('dul ba): gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / ra ro ba dang / myos pa dang / snyoms par zhugs pa dang / 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa rnams kyi drung du lhag por bgyis na/

267a1('dul ba): slong gis dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams las/ lhag por bgyis na/ lhag por bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ lhag
267a2('dul ba): por ma bgyis pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ lhag por byas pa zhes mi bya ste/ lhag por byed pa ni/ shin tu 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal pas lhag por ma bgyis pa'i
267a3('dul ba): bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'tshal na/ cir 'gyur/ ltung ba'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong mas zas 'tshal te spangs pa'i 'og tu bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'tshal na/ cir 'gyur/ ltung ba'o/ btsun
267a4('dul ba): pa/ dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma dang / dge tshul pha rnams kyis lhag por ma bgyis pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'tshal na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /mdor na/ skad dang lus dang dben de
267a5('dul ba): bzhin/ /zas dang mi rung ba dag dang / /mtshan dang bzhi pa de bzhin te/ /dge 'dun dbyen dang dge slong ma'o/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/

267a7('dul ba): na/ btsun pa/ dge slong 'phags pas 'phags pa'i skad du dge slong la lhag por ma bgyis pa'i bca' ba dang / bza' ba bstabs pa dang / dge slong des kyang 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/

273a1('dul ba): gyi gling rnams kyis bzhag pa 'tshal na/ cir 'gyur/ u pa li/ gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi dus su dus las 'das pa bzhag pa kun tu spyad de zos na/ ltung bar

273a6('dul ba): smyon pa byin len bca' ba dang / /myos pa gnyis dang don med dang / /mtshan dang bzhi pa gling rnams dang / /sprul pa mi snang 'gro ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa

280a3('dul ba): bu pa'am/ kun tu rgyu ba la bca' ba dang / bza' ba stsal na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis gcer bu pa'am/ kun tu rgyu ba la bca' ba dang / bza' ba
280a4('dul ba): gzhan las stsal na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis gcer bu pa'am/ kun tu rgyu ba la bca' ba dang / bza' ba gzhan gyi slad du stsal na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes
280a5('dul ba): byas so| |btsun pa/ dge slong gis gcer bu pa'am/ kun tu rgyu ba ma ning la bca' ba dang / bza' ba stsal na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis gcer bu pa
280a6('dul ba): 'am| kun tu rgyu ba mo yang rung / ma ning mo la bca' ba dang / bza' ba stsal na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal pas gcer bu pa'am/ kun tu rgyu ba la bca'
280a7('dul ba): pa dang / bza' ba stsal na/ cir 'gyur/ ltung ba'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong mas gcer bu pa'am/ kun tu rgyu ba la rang gi sug pa nas bca' ba dang / bza' ba stsal na/ cir

280b2('dul ba): 'gyur| nyes byas so/ /mdor na/ smyon pa sems 'khrugs na ba dang / /'on pa 'gro dang mtshan rnams dang / /lta ba rgyal po bdun pa dang / /bzhi pa dag dang ma ning ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom
280b3('dul ba): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang g.yul shom pa la bltar mchi na/ ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs na/

321a1('dul ba): gis sa la ba lang gi lci ba'am/ gyo ral chags pa bkogs na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis tshig pa brkos na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /

334a5('dul ba): du mchis na/ cir 'gyur/ ltung ba'o/ /dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma dang / dge tshul pha rnams la nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /mdor na/ 'phrin pa spring yig lag brda dang / /gzhan

361a3('dul ba): pa/ chu rlabs dang / chu rlabs kyi rgyud dam/ klung gi 'gram du ni/ mtshams dgum du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /u pa li/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar chu rlabs dang / chu rlabs kyi
361a4('dul ba): rgyud dang / klung gi 'gram ni/ g.yo zhing mi brtan pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa/ de ste klung gi 'gram brtan par gyur na/ mtshams dgum du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ rdzu 'phrul

361a6('dul ba): ngam yur ba las mtshams bzlar rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ste/ de klung ngam/ yur chu rtag tu mi 'bab par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ rtag tu 'bab pa'i chu gting zab pa las mtshams bzla bar
361a7('dul ba): rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ste/ 'di ltar yang klung dang / yur chu de la shing ngam/ rtsig pa'am/ re lde rnams kyis bkab par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste shing ngam/ re lde 'jig pa'i chos su
361b1('dul ba): gyur na/ zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ de ste sbyor ba btang na/ zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /'on te slar dga' bar sbyor bam btang na/ ma zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa mtshams gcod pa na mtshan
361b2('dul ba): gyur na/ mtshams bcad pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mtshams bcad pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ mtshams kyis mtshams dgrol du rung ngam/ u pa li/ rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang / rtsig pa'i
361b3('dul ba): mtshams ma gtogs par gzhan mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ mtshams 'jig pa rnam pa du mchis/ u pa li/ lnga ste/ mtshams med pa dang / dge slong med pa dang / re ba med pa dang / gsol ba dang /
361b4('dul ba): las dang lnga yin no/ /btsun pa/ sngon gyi mtshams ma bkrol par mtshams gzhan dgum du rung ngam/ u pa li/ rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang / rtsig pa'i mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor gyi
361b5('dul ba): mtshams ma gtogs par mi rung ngo / /u pa li/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsol pa dang / las kyis mtshams gcad do/ /gsol pa dang / las kyis mtshams dgrol lo/ /btsun pa/ mtshams bkum
361b6('dul ba): pas mtshams dgrol ba'am/ mtshams bkrol bas mtshams bkum par 'gyur pa mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ las kyis mtshams bcad na/ rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang / rtsig pa'i
361b7('dul ba): mtshams dgrol pa zhes bya'o/ /las kyis mtshams bkrol na/ rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang / rtsig pa'i mtshams bcad pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ mchis pa'i rjes su mchi ba gang / u pa li/
362a1('dul ba): mtshams so/ /btsun pa/ mchis pa'i rjes su mchis pa gang / u pa li/ mtshams so/ /btsun pa/ gnas bzhi'am/ gnas lnga'am/ de las mang yang rung /
362a2('dul ba): shing gcig gis mtshams dgum par rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ste/ ji tsam du mtshan ma bsgrag cing gzhag par nus pa'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa/ mtshams nas mtshams spo bar rung
362a3('dul ba): ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ste/ rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang / rtsig pa'i mtshams ni/ ma gtogs so/ /btsun pa/ spo mi 'tshal ba'i mtshams du/ u pa li/ gcig ste/ las kyi mtshams
362a4('dul ba): sam/ chu mig gam/ khron pa'o/ /btsun pa/ rung ba'i sa dang / mi rung ba'i sa'o/ /zhes bgyi na/ btsun pa/ rung ba'i sa gang lags/ u pa li/ gnas gang na mtshams kyi nang na rung ba'i
362a5('dul ba): gnas su byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa 'di ni/ rung ba'i sa zhes bya'o/ /u pa li/ gnas gang na mtshams kyi nang du rung ba'i gnas byin gyis ma brlabs par gyur pa 'di ni/ mi rung ba'i sa
362a6('dul ba): zhes bya'o/ /u pa li/ dam pa'i chos yod pa'i bar du ni/ mi rung ba'i sa yang yod do/ /u pa li/ dam pa'i chos med par gyur na/ thams cad kyang rung ba'i sa'o/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ dam
362a7('dul ba): pa'i chos mchis pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ gang gi tshe nan tan byed pa rnams nan tan byed cing las kyang byed de/ nan tan du bya bas nan tan byed la/ las kyang byed pa'i bar du ni/ dam pa'i
362b1('dul ba): chos yod pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ dam pa'i chos ma mchis par gyur pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ gang gi tshe nan tan byed pa rnams ni/ nan tan mi byed cing / las kyang mi byed
362b2('dul ba): de/ nan tan byed pas nan tan mi byed la las kyang mi byed pa'i tshe dam pa'i chos med par gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa khyim pas mtshams bkum na/ mtshams bkum pa
362b3('dul ba): zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du las byed pa za ma dang / ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha dang / ma dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
362b4('dul ba): pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang / rkun gnas dang / mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa dang / sngar 'khrugs pa rnams kyis
362b5('dul ba): mtshams bkum na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa
362b6('dul ba): rnams kyis mtshams bkum na/ bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mtshams bcad pa zhes ni/ bya la/ dge 'dun rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa smyon
362b7('dul ba): pas mtshams bkum na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ste dge slong gi 'du shes dang ldan la mtshan ma rnams kyang ston nus shing gsol pa'ang byas te las ma nyams
363a1('dul ba): na/ mtshams bcad pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du las byed pa sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / 'on pa rnams kyang brjod par
363a2('dul ba): bya'o/ /btsun pa/ las byed pa 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pas mtshams bkum na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ mtshams 'gum pa na las bgyid pa'i
363a3('dul ba): dge slong dus las 'das na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ste mtshan ma bsgrags par yang rtogs la/ las kyang mang du byas bar gyur na/ mtshams bcad pa zhes bya'o//
363a4('dul ba): u pa li/ de ste mtshan ma bsgrags par yang ma rtogs la/ las kyang mang du ma byas par gyur na/ mtshams ma bcad pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du khyim pa yin par shes pa dang / ma ning yin
363a5('dul ba): pa dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha dang / ma dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba yin pa dang / mu stegs can dang / mu
363a6('dul ba): stegs can du song ba yin pa dang / rkun gnas dang / mi gnas pa yin pa dang / so sor gnas pa yin pa dang / sngar nyes pa byung ba yin pa dang / sngar 'khrugs pa yin par shes pa nas/
363a7('dul ba): de bzhin du 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa bdag nyid yin par shes pa'ang rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ mtshams 'gum pa na dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis par 'tshal ba dang / nye bar phyogs
363b1('dul ba): pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa lags par 'tshal na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mtshams bcad pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ khyim pas grangs
363b2('dul ba): su bskangs te mtshams bkum na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du ma ning nas sngar 'khrugs pa rnams kyi bar du de dag gis grangs su bskangs te mtshams
363b3('dul ba): bkum na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa dge slong za mas grangs su bskangs te mtshams bkum na/ mtshams bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bcad pa zhes
363b4('dul ba): mi bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams kyis grangs su bskangs te mtshams bkum na/ mtshams
363b5('dul ba): bkum pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mtshams bcad pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /mdor na/ mtshams dang rung ba'i gnas dag dang / /las gcig klung yang de bzhin te/ /
363b6('dul ba): zhig pa dang ni gling gsum dang / /grong dang gsum pa de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ mtshams kyi mtshan ma ma mchis par gyur na/ mtshams zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ mtshams
363b7('dul ba): zhig na/ rung ba'i gnas kyang zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ las gcig dang / gsol pa gcig gis las bgyid pa phyogs gcig tu mchis te gnas bzhir mtshams
364a1('dul ba): dgum par rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ste/ ji ltar yang las byed pa'i dge slong des gnas bzhi'i mtshams su shing ngam/ dbyig pa'am/ re lde la mnan te mtshams
364a2('dul ba): bcad pa'o/ /btsun pa/ mtshams dgum pa'i gnas su klung ngam/ yur chus mtshams non na/ mtshams zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ste mtshams kyi mtshan ma brtan po yod na/ ma zhig pa
364a3('dul ba): zhes bya'o/ /de ste mtshams kyi mtshan ma med par gyur na/ zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ mtshams zhig na/ chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa yang ma mchis pa zhes bgyi'am/ mchis pa zhes
364a4('dul ba): bgyi/ u pa li/ yod pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pas ni/ las kyi mtshams su chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa skos shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ rgyang grags kyi mtshams dang / rtsig pa'i
364a5('dul ba): mtshams la yang chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa bsko bar bgyi'am/ de ste dgos par gyur na/ skos shig /btsun pa/ grong dang / gtsug lag khang lhan cig tu mchis te mtshams
364a6('dul ba): 'bral bar gyur na/ de la chos gos dang ni/ 'bral ba gang tshun chad bsgo bar bgyi/ grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni grong ngam grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs
364a7('dul ba): bar chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa bskos pa las/ grong zhig der btsugs na/ de phyogs su chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i
364b1('dul ba): sdom pa zhig par 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa bskos pa las grong gud du 'phos na/ btsun pa/ ci'i phyir phyogs der chos gos dang / mi bral
364b2('dul ba): bar sdom pa bsko bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mi dgos te/ sngon gyi sdom pa gsos pas chog go/ mdor na/ dran pa bzhi pa gsum pa dang / lnga pa dang ni gnyis tshan dang / /nyes pa gnyis dang skabs
364b3('dul ba): 'byed dang / /sems pa 'dug pa langs pa dang / /khyim pa dag la sogs pa dang / /smyon pa 'chad dang mang po'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyis skya rengs shar ba'i tshe deng ni/ bdag cag gi gso sbyong ngo / /zhes dran
364b4('dul ba): par gyur na/ dge slong de dag gis gso sbyong ji ltar bgyi/ deng bdag cag gi gso sbyong ngo / /zhes sems las tshig tu brjod cing / 'on te de na so sor thar pa klog na/ bklags pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong dag gis
364b5('dul ba): gso sbyong yang byas mod kyi/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sbyong gi las rnam pa bzhi ste/ chos bzhin ma yin par byed cing ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin ma yin
364b6('dul ba): pa la 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin la ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin la 'dus pa rnams so/ /zhes gsungs na/ chos bzhin ma yin par byed cing ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe so sor thar pa bklag par
364b7('dul ba): bya ba de'i tshe mi klog / gang gis bklag par bya ba des mi klog /ji ltar bklag par bya ba de ltar mi klog /ji srid du bklag pa de srid du mi klog pa dang ma 'dus par gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa la 'dus
365a1('dul ba): pa gang zhe na/ gang gi so sor thar pa bklag par bya ba de'i tshe mi klog pa nas rgyas par ji srid du bklag par bya ba de srid du mi klog cing 'dus par gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin la
365a2('dul ba): ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe so sor thar pa bklag par bya ba de'i tshe klog /gang gis bklag par bya ba des klog /ji ltar bklag par bya ba de ltar klog /ji tsam du bklag par bya ba de tsam bklags
365a3('dul ba): pa dang ma 'dus par gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin la 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe so sor thar pa bklag par bya ba de'i tshe klog pa nas rgyas bar ji srid du bklag par bya ba de srid du klog cing 'dus par gyur
365a4('dul ba): ba'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa/ 'phags pas 'phags pa'i skad du so sor thar pa bklags pa dang / dge slong de dag gis 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/
365a5('dul ba): ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /mtha' 'khob pas 'phags pa'i skad du so sor thar pa bklags pa dang / dge slong de dag gis 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal
365a6('dul ba): na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /'phags pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du so sor thar pa bklags
365a7('dul ba): pa dang / dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa yang 'das pa dang bcas
365b1('dul ba): pa'o/ /mtha' 'khob pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du so sor thar pa'i mdo bklags pa dang / dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma
365b2('dul ba): byas pa zhes bya ste/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pa'i grangs nam mkha' la gnas pas bskangs te so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bklags na/
365b3('dul ba): gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ nam mkha' la gnas pa'i grangs sa la gnas pas bskangs te
365b4('dul ba): so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bklags na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pa rnams la nam mkha'
365b5('dul ba): la gnas pas so sor thar pa'i mdo klog cing gso sbyong bgyis na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ nam
365b6('dul ba): mkha' la gnas pa rnams la sa la gnas pas so sor thar pa'i mdo klog cing gso sbyong bgyis na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang
365b7('dul ba): bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na 'dug pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug par lhan cig rgyas pas bzhir bya'o/ /btsun pa/ so sor thar pa klog pa la rnam pa du mchis/ u pa li/ rnam pa lnga
366a1('dul ba): ste/ gsol ba byas nas gleng gzhi bklags te lhag ma rnams thos par zad do/ /zhes bsgrags pa 'di ni/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa dang po'o/ /gsol ba byas nas
366a2('dul ba): gleng gzhi bklags te phas pham pa bzhi bklags nas lhag ma rnams thos pa'o/ /zhes bsgrags pa 'di ni/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa gnyis pa'o/ /gsol ba byas te gleng gzhi bklags/ phas
366a3('dul ba): pham pa bzhi bklags/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum bklags la lhag ma rnams thos pa'o/ /zhes bsgrags pa 'di ni/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa gsum pa'o/ /gsol ba byas te gleng gzhi
366a4('dul ba): bklags/ phas pham pa bzhi dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum dang / mi mngon pa gnyis bklags nas lhag ma rnams thos pa'o/ /zhes bsgrags pa 'di ni/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bzhi pa
366a5('dul ba): ste| rgyas pa klog pa dang 'di lnga'o/ /btsun pa/ gso sbyong gi las la rnam pa du/ u pa li/ lnga ste/ bklag pa dang / mi bklag par sems bskyed pa dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang /
366a6('dul ba): skabs 'byed pa dang rnam pa lnga'o/ /btsun pa/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pas so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa klog pa'i tshe mtshan gyur na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya'o/ /
366a7('dul ba): btsun pa/ dge slong phyogs gcig tu mchis pas gnas bzhir so sor thar pa'i mdo bklags la/ gso sbyong yang bgyis na/ dge slong de dag 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa
366b1('dul ba): li/ yod de/ 'di ltar so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa'i dge slong de gnas pa'i mtshams su shing ngam/ dbyig pa'am/ re ldes mnan te so sor thar pa'i mdo bklags pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gnas gcig
366b2('dul ba): pa'i mtshams kyi nang na gnas gcig pa'i dge slong rnams kyis phyogs bzhir so sor gso sbyong bgyis na/ gso sbyong yang bgyis la dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas bar mi 'gyur ba mchis
366b3('dul ba): sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ gcig gis gcig la dad pa byin pa'o/ /btsun pa/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa'i dge slong phyogs gcig tu mchis pa mtshams kyi nang dang / mtshams kyi slad rol na
366b4('dul ba): gnas pa rnams la so sor thar pa bklags na/ gso sbyong yang bgyis la/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar yang so sor thar pa'i mdo
366b5('dul ba): klog pa'i dge slong gis mtshams non te mnan nas mtshams su 'greng ngam 'dug la/ mtshams kyi nang dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na/ gnas pa rnams la so sor thar pa bklags pa'o/ /btsun
366b6('dul ba): pa| dge slong gis so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa lnga las gang yang rung ste/ so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa ma bklags kyang gso sbyong bgyis par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ skabs 'byed
366b7('dul ba): pa'i tshe skabs 'byed pas skabs phye ba'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis tshig tu ma smras kyang gso sbyong bgyis par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ sems bskyed pas so/ /btsun pas 'khor rnams
367a1('dul ba): ma langs/ dge slong rnams ni/ ma dong pa'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ 'khor ma longs pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ gang du dge slong bzhi'am/ de las mang
367a2('dul ba): du 'dug par gyur na/ ma langs pa zhes bya'o/ /bzhir ma tshang na ni/ langs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bklags pa dang / stan las langs te mchis nas dge slong
367a3('dul ba): mchis bzhin du 'tshal bar ma bgyis kyang kun tu ltung bar mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ bshang ba dang / gci ba'i sar song ste/ de yang thos pa'i nye 'khor las ma 'das pa'o/ /khyim
367a4('dul ba): pas so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bgyis te gso sbyong bgyis na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ gso sbyong ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du za
367a5('dul ba): ma dang / ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa dang / 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa nas sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag ni/ u pa li/ gso sbyong ma byas pa zhes bya
367a6('dul ba): ste| dge 'dun kyang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bgyis te gso sbyong
367a7('dul ba): bgyis na/ bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong rnams ni/ 'das pa dang / bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ smyon pas so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa bgyis te gso sbyong bgyis na/
367b1('dul ba): gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / 'on pas so sor
367b2('dul ba): thar pa'i mdo klog pa bgyis te gso sbyong bgyis na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ gso sbyong byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /ji ltar so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa de
367b3('dul ba): bzhin du mang por bskang pa yang rgyas par sbyar ro/ /mdor na/ ma phul blangs pa dge 'dun dang / /bzhi pa dang ni gnyis pa mtshan/ /'khor ba dang ni gcig nas gcig /byin dang lam dang de bzhin mang //
367b4('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa blangs te steng gi nam mkha' las re ba med par mchis sam mtshams
367b5('dul ba): kyi slad rol du mchis na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste re ba dang bcas pas mchis na/ dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma phul
367b6('dul ba): ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pas nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams la dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa stsal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /blang du rung ngam/ u
367b7('dul ba): pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ nam mkha' la gnas pas sa la gnas pa rnams la dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa stsal par rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /blang bar rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /
368a1('dul ba): de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang du 'dug pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa rnams la yang bzhir bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing
368a2('dul ba): tshogs pa la dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul na/ des dad pa dang / yongs su dag pa phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ phul ba zhes bya'o/ /sus rma bar bgyi/ sus kyang ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge

374a3('dul ba): ni| 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /dad pa dang / skabs phye ba phul nas khyim pa lags par khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul ba zhes bya'o/ /
374a4('dul ba): de bzhin du ma ning lags par khas blangs pa nas rgyas par sngar 'khrugs pa lags pa'i bar du khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul
374a5('dul ba): ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dad pa dang / skabs 'byed pa 'bul ba'i dge slong dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba 'bul ba'i tshe za ma lags par khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba ma phul
374a6('dul ba): ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ de ste dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa lags par khas blangs pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa lags par
374a7('dul ba): khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs phye ba phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dad pa dang / skabs dbye ba len pa'i dge slong gis dad pa dang / skabs phye
374b1('dul ba): ba blangs nas dge 'dun gyi nang du mchis te khyim pa lags par khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul ba zhes mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du ma ning
374b2('dul ba): lags par khas blangs pa nas rgyas par sngar 'khrugs pa lags pa'i bar du khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma phul ba zhes mi bya'o/ /
374b3('dul ba): btsun pa/ de ste za ma lags par khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa nas bslab pa
374b4('dul ba): stsal pa lags par bar du khas blangs na/ dad pa dang / skabs phye ba ma phul ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /skabs 'byed pa'i dngos po rdzogs so// //mdor na/ gru dang nam mkha' gsum pa dang / /spyod yul the tshom song ba dang / /mtshan dang gsum pa gnas rnams dang / /dbyar gsum pa dang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis
374b5('dul ba): phur pa la btags pa'i grur dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste dbyar gyi nang logs su gru btang
374b6('dul ba): na| dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge slong zhig zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te steng gi nam mkha' las mtshams
375a1('dul ba): kyi slad rol du mchis na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ dbyar ma zhig pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ dbyar ma zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis steng gi nam mkha' la
375a2('dul ba): dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis steng gi nam mkha' la gzhal med khang du dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes
375a3('dul ba): bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste gzhal med khang de nas gnas gzhan du mchis na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom
375a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis gang spyod yul la brten te tshul du zhugs shig / ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis spyod yul ma mchis par dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/
375a5('dul ba): u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis spyod yul la brten te dbyar tshul du zhugs par gyur na/ ci/ des der zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te mchi ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa
375a6('dul ba): li/ ma yin te/ des de nyid la brten nas dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis dbyar tshul du zhugs te bdag tshul du zhugs sam ma zhugs zhes the tshom za zhing dogs par gyur
375a7('dul ba): na| tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste the tshom dang dogs pa las the tshom dang dogs pa bsal ma nus na/ des slar yang dbyar tshul du 'jug
375b1('dul ba): par bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du 'jug par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de'i dbyar gyi tshul gang lags/ u pa li/ snga ma'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis gnas 'dir dbyar gnas par bya'o/ /snyam du song ste
375b2('dul ba): bsam nas gtsug lag khang zhig tu song ste de der phyin pa dang / skya rengs shar nas dbyar phyi mar gyur na/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya ste/ des der tshul du 'jug
375b3('dul ba): par bsam pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis gtsug lag khang zhig tu song ste gnas 'dir bdag tshul du 'jug go /zhes bsam nas des rkang pa ya gcig ni/ mtshams kyi nang du bzhag /rkang pa ya
375b4('dul ba): gcig ni/ mtshams kyi slad rol du bzhag pa dang / skya rengs shar nas dbyar phyi mar gyur na/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya ste/ des de ltar der tshul du 'jug
375b5('dul ba): par bsam pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis dbyar tshul du zhugs pa na mtshan gyur na/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /des gnas der gnas par
375b6('dul ba): bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang du song la gnas par gyis shig /btsun pa/ dge slong gis gnas bzhir dbyar tshul du zhugs kyang dbyar tshul du zhugs par 'gyur ba
375b7('dul ba): mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong des gnas bzhi'i mtshams su shing ngam/ 'od ma'am/ re ldes mnan te dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'o/ /de gang du gnas par bgyi/ gang dga' bar
376a1('dul ba): ro| |btsun pa/ de ste shing ngam/ 'od ma'am/ re lde ni/ 'jig pa'i chos can du gyur na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /des dbyar gang du gnas par
376a2('dul ba): bgyi| gang dga' ba'i gnas gcig tu'o/ /de'i dbyar gang du gtogs/ /sems kyis gang du gnas par bsam pa'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni/ btang ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste de phan chad zhag
376a3('dul ba): bdun du byin gyis brlabs par gnas de nas gnyis por mchis na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis gnas bzhi'am/ de las mang
376a4('dul ba): ba rnams mtshams gcig tu bgyis te dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ gnas de dag thams cad du dbyar tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /des gang du
376a5('dul ba): gnas par bgyi/ gang dga' bar ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis gnas gcig tu dbyar tshul du zhugs te de slan chad gnas gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi par dbyar tshul du zhugs na/
376a6('dul ba): tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /gnas gang du/ phyi mar ro/ /btsun pa/ gang la dbyar gyi tshul snga ma yang ma mchis/ phyi ma yang ma mchis na/ de'i ming
376a7('dul ba): ji skad ces bgyi/ u pa li/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gang la snga ma dang / phyi ma'i dbyar gyi tshul mchis la/ des kyang zhag bdun du byin gyis ma brlabs par mtshams kyi slad rol
376b1('dul ba): du don zhig gi slad du mchis te slar mchis bsam na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /ci/ des yang slar dbyar tshul du 'jug par bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/
376b2('dul ba): de yi dam las 'gal bas na/ nyes ba 'chags su chug cig /btsun pa/ ji srid du dbyar tshul du 'jug /u pa li/ zla ba gsum mo/ /btsun pa/ gang dbyar slad mar tshul du zhugs par gyur
376b3('dul ba): pa des ji ltar tshul nas 'byung bar bgyi/ nam zhugs pa na zla ba gsum du gnas pa'i grangs tshang ba'am/ yang na rkyen zhig byung na yang rung ngo / /mdor na/ skya rengs bsam pa spangs pa dang / /gnas
376b4('dul ba): dang shing rta ba lang khyim/ /shing dang grog po phug de bzhin/ /zhig pa 'gro yang de bzhin te/ /sde lnga dang ni bsam pa dang / /bdun po dang ni mi gnas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs su dge
376b5('dul ba): 'dun 'khrugs nas der yang dge slong gis bsam bzhin du chos kyi phyogs dang chos ma lags pa'i phyogs la gnas na/ /dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ste lta ba sgrog bzhin pa
376b6('dul ba): las skya rengs shar na ni/ dbyar zhig ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gi mdun du dbyar tshul du zhugs shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis dge
376b7('dul ba): slong ma mchis nas sems bskyed de dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ tshul du zhugs pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong yod bzhin na ni/ 'das pa dang
377a1('dul ba): bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong dbyar gyi nang logs su spangs pa de dang lhan cig gnas su gnas par bgyi'am/ u pa li/ gnas par bya ste/ skabs phye
377a2('dul ba): nas ma gnas shig / btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ gang dge slong gis gnas 'di na bdag la dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / ma lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong de lta bu dag gis
377a3('dul ba): the tshom ma skyes pa dag ni/ mi skyed/ the tshom skyes pa ni/ sel bar byed/ yod dam med pa'i gnas rtogs la dbyar tshul du zhugs shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ mdo sde 'dzin
377a4('dul ba): pa dang / ma lta bu 'dzin pa ma mchis par dbyar tshul du 'jug tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa ma mchis par dbyar tshul du 'jug tu rung ngam/ u
377a5('dul ba): pa li/ mi rung ngo / /de ste btsun pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa ma mchis na/ so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa'i dge slong btsal 'tshal lam/ so sor thar pa 'don pa med na/ dbyar tshul du 'jug
377a6('dul ba): tu mi gnang ngo / /btsun pa/ shing rta spyod pa'i khyim mam/ ba lang rdzi'i khyim du gnas te dbyar tshul du 'jug tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ de ste des 'di snyam du dbyar tshul gnas 'di nas gung
377a7('dul ba): du mi 'dong bar des bsam na/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ de ste tshul du zhugs pa las dong na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ shing drung ngam/ ri brag gam/
377b1('dul ba): phug gam/ spyil por dbyar tshul du 'jug tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ dge slong gis don zhig gi slad du zhag bdun nam bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs te mchis pa las/ de yang dus
377b2('dul ba): 'das par gyur na/ zhag bdun nam bzhi bcur byin gyis brlabs pa de zhig ces bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ don gzhan gyi zad par gyis shig /btsun pa/ dge slong gis zhag bdun na
377b3('dul ba): skabs 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas byin gyis ma brlabs par mchis na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste zhag drug gam/ lnga'am/ bzhi'am/
377b4('dul ba): gcig na tshul nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas byin gyis brlabs par mchis na/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ dbyar zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag
377b5('dul ba): bdun du byin gyis rlobs la song shig / ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ gang gis byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ u pa li/ sde lngas so/ /gang du byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ mtshams kyi nang du'o/ /ji ltar
377b6('dul ba): byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ sems bskyed la tshig tu brjod par bya ste/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mtshams kyi nang gi gnas 'dir dbyar snga ma gsum tshul du zhugs te bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
377b7('dul ba): don 'di lta bu'i phyir mtshams kyi slad rol du mchi bar byin gyis brlabs te bdag gi dbyar ni/ 'di nyid de/ dbyar 'di nyid du gnas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gang gi don du byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ u
378a1('dul ba): pa li| sde bdun gyi phyir ro/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ zhag bzhi bcu'i sdom pa stsol cig /ces gsungs na/ gang la stsal bar bgyi/ u pa li/ sde lnga
378a2('dul ba): la'o| |btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ dge 'dun gyi don gyi slad du ni/ zhag bzhi bcu'i sdom pa byin cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang /
378a3('dul ba): dge tshul ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge bsnyen pha dang / bsnyen gnas 'di las slad rol gyi mu stegs can dge sbyong gzhan bram ze dang / spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyi
378a4('dul ba): don gyi slad du zhag bzhi bcu'i sdom pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ /zhag bzhi bcur bsko bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ zhag
378a5('dul ba): sum cu rtsa dgu'am/ zhag sum cu'am/ zhag nyi shur bsko bar rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ zhag bzhi bcu'i steng du yang zhag sum cu rtsa dgu'am/ zhag sum cu'am/ zhag nyi
378a6('dul ba): shu'am/ zhag bcu'am/ zhag bdun du bskor bar rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ zhag sum cu rtsa dgu'i steng du zhag sum cu'am/ zhag nyi shu'am/ zhag bcu'am/ zhag bdun
378a7('dul ba): du bsko bar rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ zhag bzhi bcu'i steng du zhag bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /u pa li/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshams kyi
378b1('dul ba): nang du ni/ zhag mang du gnas par bya'o/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol tu ni/ zhag nyung ngu gnas par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ zhag sum rtsa dgu'i steng du zhag bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo //
378b2('dul ba): btsun pa/ zhag sum cu'am/ nyi shu'am/ zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag bzhi bcur bsko bar rung ngam/ u
378b3('dul ba): pa li/ mi rung ngo / /u pa li/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshams kyi nang du ni/ zhag mang du gnas par bya'o/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol tu ni/ zhag nyung du gnas par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag
378b4('dul ba): sum cu rtsa dgur bsko bar rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ zhag bdun gyi steng du zhag sum cu'am/ zhag nyi shu'am/ zhag bcu'am/ zhag bdun du bskor rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun
378b5('dul ba): pa| dge slong dbyar tshul du zhugs pa las slob dpon dang / mkhan po dus bgyis nas des gnas bca' ba ma rnyed de mchis na/ de dbyar zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ dbyar zhig pa zhes
378b6('dul ba): bya'o| |dbyar gyi dngos po rdzogs so/ / //mdor na/ lham gnyis pags pa rnam gnyis dang / /dom lpags yang na mjug ma dang / /mal stan mtho dang mal stan che/ /lham yu
378b7('dul ba): can dang shing lham mo/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lham mi rung ba rnam pa lnga ma 'chang zhig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ gzhan yang gcan gzan mi sun pa dang / ba lang ngan pa dang / rta ngan
379a1('dul ba): pa gzhan dag kyang mchis na/ de dag gi pags pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bgyi'am/ u pa li/ lham de dag kyang ma 'chang zhig /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
379a2('dul ba): khyim pas bgos pa'i lham dman ma bor ba chongs shig / ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong khyim pas bor ba'i lham dman ma bcangs kyang nongs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba mchis sam/
379a3('dul ba): u pa li/ yod de/ /'di ltar yang dge slong des thams cad ri mo can nam/ gser gyis brgyan pa'am/ dngul gyis brgyan pa bcangs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis mi rung ba rnam pa lnga bcangs
379a4('dul ba): kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar yang des ri dwags phra mo'am/ klus 'jig par gyur na'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis pags pa ma
379a5('dul ba): 'chang zhig / pags pa'i steng du ma 'dug cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis pags pa'i steng du 'dug pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ ji tsam rkub tshos bzhag par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa
379a6('dul ba): ji tsam gyis na/ nyal ba zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ lus kyis 'phres pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis pags pa ma 'chang zhig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong
379a7('dul ba): gis pags pa bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ nad pas ni/ pags pa chongs shig /mi na bas ni/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
379b1('dul ba): dom gyi pags pa chongs shig / ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ci/ nad pas bcang bar bgyi'am/ 'on te mi na bas kyang bcang bar bgyi/ u pa li/ na ba dang / mi na ba gnyis kas chongs shig
379b2('dul ba): btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mjug ma lnga la 'jus te klung rgol cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ rkang pa bzhi pa gzhan dag kyang mchis na/ de dag gi las rgal bar yang rung ngam/ u
379b3('dul ba): pa li/ rgol cig /btsun pa/ de ste pho ma mchis na/ mo'i las rgal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ni/ bar chad cig byung na/ rgal bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
379b4('dul ba): mal stan mthon por ma 'dug cig / ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ mal stan mthon po'i tshad ji tsam/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sor brgyad las lhag pa ni/ mal stan mthon po'o/ /btsun
379b5('dul ba): pa| bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams mal stan mtho zhing che ba lam 'dug cig / ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong mal stan mtho zhing che ba la mchis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur
379b6('dul ba): ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ /lha'i khyim dang / klu'i khyim dang / gnod sbyin gyi khyim dang / rgyal po'i khyim dang / rgyal po'i blon po'i khyim de dag tu stan gzhan med na'o/ /btsun
379b7('dul ba): pa| dge slong gis bzhon pa la 'tshal na/ nongs pa gsum du 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar yang bzhon pa de mo yin pa dang / gser gyis brgyan par gyur pa'o//
380a1('dul ba): btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ljongs kha ba can du lham yu ba can chongs shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis de las gzhan pa'i ljongs su lham
380a2('dul ba): yu ba can bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ gang du lham yu ba can med na/ 'tsho bar mi nus pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis
380a3('dul ba): shing lham ma 'chang zhig / ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis shing lham bcangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ /chu yod pa'i yul chus
380a4('dul ba): gang bas shing lham med par 'gro bar mi nus pa der ro/ /pags pa'i dngos po rdzogs so// //mdor na/ sman gnyis lan tshwa rnam pa gnyis/ /mar la rnam gnyis
380a5('dul ba): de bzhin te/ /sa dang btsos dang bu ram dang / /'bru mar phan pa tha ma'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ sman de nyid snga dro'i lags la/
380a6('dul ba): de nyid slad dro'i yang lags/ de nyid zhag bdun pa'i yang lags/ de nyid nam 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba lags par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ u pa li/ bu ram shing
380a7('dul ba): ni/ snga dro'i 'o/ /khu ba ni/ phyi dro'i 'o/ /bu ram ni/ zhag bdun pa'i 'o/ /bsregs pa'i thal ba ni/ nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /u pa li/ zho ni/ snga dro'i 'o/ chu ni/ phyi dro'i 'o/ /mar ni/ zhag bdun
380b1('dul ba): pa'i 'o/ /bsregs pa'i thal ba ni/ nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /u pa li/ sha ni/ snga dro'i 'o/ /zhag ni/ zhag bdun pa'i 'o/ /bsregs pa'i thal pa ni/ nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /u pa li/ 'bru ni/ snga dro'i
380b2('dul ba): 'o| |'bru mar ni/ zhag bdun pa'i 'o/ /bsregs pa'i thal ba ni/ nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa/ snga dro ba dang / phyi dro ba dang / zhag bdun pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar gyi sman 'di dag rnams phan tshun
380b3('dul ba): 'dres na/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ blangs pa dang / byin len ma bgyis pa dang / blangs pa la byin len bgyis pa dang / nang du bzhag pa dang / nang du btsos pa dang /
380b4('dul ba): rang gis btsos pa'i rnams 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ dge slong gis snga dro'i dang / slad dro'i dang / zhag bdun pa'i dang / nam 'tsho'i bar gyi sman gang lags pa de dag blangs
380b5('dul ba): pa dang / byin len ma bgyis pa dang / blangs pa la byin len bgyis pa dang / nang du bzhag pa dang / nang du btsos pa dang / rang gis btsos pa dang / dge slong gis btsos pa'i rnams 'tshal na/ cir
380b6('dul ba): 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong mas snga dro ba'i dang / slad dro ba'i dang / zhag bdun pa'i dang / nam 'tsho'i bar gyi sman gang lags pa de dag blangs pa dang / byin len ma bgyis pa
380b7('dul ba): dang / blangs pa la byin len byas pa dang / nang du bzhag pa dang / nang du btsos pa dang / rang gis btsos pa dang / dge slong mas btsos pa rnams 'tshal na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun
381a1('dul ba): pa| dge slong gis blangs pa la byin len bgyis pa dang / nang du bzhag pa dang / nang du btsos pa dang / rang gis btsos pa dang / dge slong gis btsos pa 'tshal
381a2('dul ba): ba na mtshan 'phos te dge slong mar gyur na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong mas blangs pa la byin len bgyis dang / nang du bzhag pa dang / nang du btsos pa dang / rang gis
381a3('dul ba): btsos pa dang / dge slong mas btsos pa 'tshal ba na mtshan 'phos te dge slong phar gyur na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ snga dro ba gang lags pa dang / slad dro ba gang lags
381a4('dul ba): pa dang / zhag bdun pa gang lags pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar gyi sman rnams gang lags pa phan tshun 'dres te ma phye na/ nam 'tsho'i bar du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pa li/
381a5('dul ba): mi rung ste/ snga dro ba dang / phyi dro ba dang / zhag bdun pa de rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bya ba byar mi rung ste/ byin gyis brlab tu mi rung ngo / /de ste yang snga dro ba'i dang / phyi dro ba'i dang /
381a6('dul ba): zhag bdun pa'i rnams dbye bar nus na/ byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ btsun pa/ mi rung ba zhig gis lan tshwa btsos nas 'tshal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mi na bas bza' bar mi
381a7('dul ba): bya'o| |sha las btsos pa'am/ mar las btsos pa'am/ 'bru mar las btsos pa yang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ mi rung ba'i lan tshwas 'bru mar ram/ mar btsos pa 'tshal du
381b1('dul ba): rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ mar ram/ 'bru mar chang dang lhan cig btsos pa 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ bzar rung ngo / /btsun pa/ mar ram/ 'bru mar chang dang lhan cig
381b2('dul ba): tu 'dres par gyur pa 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ chang gis spangs pa'i sman 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ na ba la ni/ rung gi /mi na ba la ni/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ mi
381b3('dul ba): rung ba'i sa la shing zhig skyes la/ mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu zhig lhung na/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /mi rung ba'i sa la shing zhig skyes la rung ba'i sar 'bras bu lhung na/ 'tshal
381b4('dul ba): du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /rung ba'i sa la shing zhig skyes la/ mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu lhung na/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ de ste zhag gcig lon par ma gyur na ni/ bza' bar bya'o/ /rung ba'i sa la
381b5('dul ba): shing zhig skyes la rung ba'i sar 'bras bu lhung na/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ bzar rung ngo / /rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la/ mi rung ba'i sa na mchis bas zhugs sam/ zhugs lce'am/
381b6('dul ba): zhugs lce chad pas rung bar bgyid na/ rung zhes bgyi'am/ bgyis pa zhes brjod dam/ 'tshal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /rung pa'i sa na zhugs mchis la/ mi rung ba'i sa na
381b7('dul ba): mchis pas zhugs su bcug na/ rung zhes bgyi'am/ bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /mi rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la/ rung ba'i sa na mchis pas zhugs
382a1('dul ba): sam| zhugs lce'am/ zhugs lce chad pas rung bar bgyis na/ rung bar bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ rung bar byas pa zhes bya ste/ bza' bar bya'o/ /mi rung
382a2('dul ba): ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la/ rung ba'i sa na mchis pas zhugs su stsal na/ rung bar bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ rung bar byas pa zhes bya'o/ /'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ bza' bar bya'o/ /mi
382a3('dul ba): rung ba'i sa na sgyed pu gsum mchis la/ rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis pa'i zhugs lce des bsgral du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /mi rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la rung ba'i sa na sgyed
382a4('dul ba): pu gnyis mchis pa dang / mi rung ba'i sa na sgyed pu gcig mchis pa zhugs lce des bsgral na/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /mi rung ba'i sa na sgyed bu gcig mchis la/ rung
382a5('dul ba): ba'i sa na zhugs mchis pa de'i zhugs lces bsgral na/ de 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis la rung ba'i sa na sgyed bu gnyis mchis pa dang / mi rung
382a6('dul ba): pa'i sa na sgyed pu gcig mchis la zhugs lce des bsgral na/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ bza' bar bya'o/ /rung ba'i sa na sgyed pu gsum mchis la rung ba'i sa na zhugs mchis na zhugs
382a7('dul ba): lce des bsgral na/ 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ dge slong gis sa bon gyi rigs lnga la zhugs sam/ mtshon tam/ sen mos rung bar bgyid na/ rung bar bgyis
382b1('dul ba): pa zhes bgyi'am/ rung bar byas pa zhes bya ste/ rung bar byas pas na/ bza' bar bya'o/ /mes rung bar byas pa ma gtogs te/ lhag ma rnams ni/ bza' bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das
382b2('dul ba): kyis btung ba rnam pa brgyad 'thung zhig / ces gsungs na/ rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / 'bras bu dang / bsngal bar bsres pa 'di dag 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun
382b3('dul ba): pa| bu ram chab dgung bdun du byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /ji srid du btung bar bgyi/ dngos por ma gyur pa'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa/ mi rung ba'i sman 'bru mar du bsgral ba
382b4('dul ba): 'tshal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ nad pa'i g.yog ji ltar bgyi/ ston pa'i 'du shes pas sman phan pa dang mthun pas g.yog bya'o/ /btsun pa/ nad pa la ci stsal bar bgyi/
382b5('dul ba): u pa li/ rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba ma gtogs par gang gis nad pa sos par 'gyur ba de dag byin cig /mdor na/ 'ug pa 'ol ba bya rgod dang / /bya rog kang+ka chu skyar mo/ /mi ro za'i bya rnams
382b6('dul ba): dang / /sen mo mchu stobs gang ldan pa'o/ /btsun pa/ 'ug pa'i sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /'ol ba'i sha dang / bya rgod kyi sha dang / bya rog gi sha dang / bya kang+ka'i sha dang / chu
382b7('dul ba): skyar mo'i sha dang / gzhan yang mi ro 'tshal ba rnams dang / sen mo dang / mchu stobs dang ldan pa'i sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /mdor na/ kan+tu dang ni pad pa
383a1('dul ba): dang / /srin bu sbal pa'ang de bzhin te/ /sre mo sbrul dang go d+ha dang / /sbal pa dkar po rnga mo sram/ /btsun pa/ srog chags kan+tu'i sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa
383a2('dul ba): li| mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ pad pa'i sha dang / sbal pa'i sha dang / sre mo'i sha dang / sbrul gyi sha dang / go d+ha'i sha dang / sbal pa dkar po'i sha dang / sram gyi sha dang / bya rog gi sha dang /
383a3('dul ba): gzhan yang chu na gnas pa dang / sen mo dang mche ba'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / gzhan yang mi ro za ba de dag gi sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /mdor na/ bal glang dang
383a4('dul ba): yang wa dang rta/ /spre'u dang mi yang de bzhin te/ /seng+ge stag dang dom dag dang / /sen mo mche ba gang mthu ldan/ /btsun pa/ ba lang gi sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /
383a5('dul ba): btsun pa/ rta dang / wa'i sha dang / spre'u'i sha dang / mi'i sha dang / seng+ge'i sha dang / stag gi sha dang / dom gyi sha dang / gzhan yang rkang bzhi pa sen mo dang mche ba'i stobs dang ldan
383a6('dul ba): pa de dag gi sha 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ gang gi sha 'tshal du mi rung ba de'i zhag dang / 'o ma 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /u pa li/ de
383a7('dul ba): ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ gang gis sha mi rung ba de'i thams cad kyang mi rung ba'o/ /btsun pa/ sha rjen 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /bdag gi phyir bsad pa'i sha
383b1('dul ba): 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /sman gyi dngos po rdzogs so// //'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po bco brgyad pa/ mdor na/ dbyar gnyis bye bar gyur pa gnas/ /
383b2('dul ba): rnyed dang dge 'dun dag gi gnyis/ /smyos pa chad pa gsum pa dang / /sbyor ba mgron po mang po dbyar/ /btsun pa/ khyim bdag cig gis dbyar tshul du zhugs pa la chos gos 'di 'bul lo/ /
383b3('dul ba): zhes mchi ste/ dbyar gnas pa rnams la chos gos shig phul na/ de la dbyar gyi zla ba tha mar yang ma gyur la/ gtan pa yang ma bting na/ gang gis 'thob/ u pa li/ dbyar gnas pa
383b4('dul ba): rnams kyis so/ /btsun pa/ khyim bdag cig gis chos gos 'di ni/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa rnams la 'bul lo/ /zhes mchi ste/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge 'dun rnams la phul
383b5('dul ba): ba der dbyar gyi zla ba yang tha mar gyur la gnas der gtan pa bting na/ gang gis 'thob/ dbyar gnas pa rnams kyis so/ /btsun pa/ khyim bdag cig gis dge 'dun la gnas 'dir
383b6('dul ba): dge slong gang gnas pa de dag la chos gos 'di 'bul lo/ /zhes mchi ste/ gos shig phul na/ gang gis 'thob/ gang la byin pas so/ /de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / gsum pa nas
383b7('dul ba): bcu pa'i bar du rgyas par de dag la phul na/ gang gis 'thob/ gang la byin pas so/ /btsun pa/ khyim bdag cig gis dge 'dun la gos shig phul te gos 'di ni/ gnas 'dir
384a1('dul ba): sang phod gnas pa'i dge slong de dag la dbul lo/ /zhes mchi na/ gang gis 'thob/ gang la byin pas so/ /de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / gsum pa nas lo bcu'i
384a2('dul ba): bar du gnas pa de dag la dbul lo/ /zhes mchi na/ gang gis 'thob/ gang la byin pas so/ /'on te gnas de na da ltar mi gnas par gyur na/ dge slong de dag gis gos de dag bgo
384a3('dul ba): bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bgo bar gyis shig /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun dag bye na/ dbyar gyi rnyed pa de dag stsal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun

384a5('dul ba): nang logs su dge slong gis lhung bzed dang / chos gos btsal te mchis na/ de'i dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ de ste dbyar gyi gnas
384a6('dul ba): su yun ring du gnas par gyur na/ de'i dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal tam/ u pa li/ byin cig /su la/ gang la bcol pa'am bsngos par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs
384a7('dul ba): su dge slong zhig dus bgyis na/ de la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ ma sbyin cig /de ste dbyar gyi nang logs su yun ring du gnas par gyur te dus 'das na/ dbyar gyi rnyed
384b1('dul ba): pa stsal tam/ u pa li/ byin cig /su la/ gang la bsngos par gyur pa la'o/ /'on te su la'ang bsngos par gyur pa ma mchis na/ su la stsal/ dge 'dun la'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar
384b2('dul ba): gyi nang logs su dge slong zhig dge tshul pha lags par khas blangs na/ de la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ sbyin par bya'o/ /de la ji tsam zhig stsal/ dge tshul pha'i skal pa'o//
384b3('dul ba): de ste dbyar gyi gnas su yun ring du gnas par gyur nas dge tshul pha lags par khas blangs na/ ji tsam stsal bar bgyi/ dge slong gi skal pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs
384b4('dul ba): su dge slong zhig khyim pa lags par khas blangs na/ de dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal par bgyi'am/ mi sbyin no/ /de ste dbyar gyi gnas su yun ring du gnas par gyur nas khyim pa lags par
384b5('dul ba): las blangs na/ de dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal par bgyi'am/ byin cig /su la/ gang la bsngos par gyur pa la'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong zhig ma ning lags
384b6('dul ba): par khas blangs pa dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha dang / ma dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / de bzhin gshegs la ngan sems

385a1('dul ba): dag la dbyar gyi rnyed pa stsal par bgyi'am/ u pa li/ mi sbyin no/ /btsun pa/ de ste dbyar gyi gnas su yun ring du gnas par gyur nas rab tu shes na/

385b1('dul ba): bgyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar yang dge slong gcig pu gnas par gyur la de yang mi dag gis dge 'dun gyi phyir gos phul na'o/ /

385b6('dul ba): cig las ni/ mi blang bar bya'o/ /gang las blang bar bya/ gang la pha'am/ ma'am/ spun nam/ sring mo gson pa'am/ rang gi khyim nas byung yang rung ste/ yongs su gtong ba'i

386a2('dul ba): pa'o/ /btsun pa/ nad g.yog gi sbyor ba btang bar gyur te gzhan la yang spro bar bgyis la nad pa yang dus bgyis na/ nad g.yog gang la gos stsal par bgyi/ phyi ma la'o/ /btsun pa/

386a4('dul ba): gos sbyin par bya'o/ /'on te gzhan gyi don zhig la song na ni/ mi sbyin no/ /btsun pa/ nad g.yog gnas gzhan du dbyar du zhugs par gyur na/ de la nad g.yog gi gos stsal par bgyi'am/

386a7('dul ba): pa/ mgron po mang po bcom pa'i gos rnyed na/ blang bar bgyi'am/ mi blang bar bgyi/ u pa li/ de ste tshong pas byin na/ blang bar bya'o/ /'on te rkun pos byin na/ de'i tshe mi
386b1('dul ba): blang ngo / /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dbyar gyi nang logs su dbyar gyi rnyed pa ma bgod cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ khyim bdag cig gis gnas mang zhig nas

386b7('dul ba): pa/ grong khyer du dge 'dun tshul du zhugs nas dbyar gyi nang logs su bye na/ dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang gis 'thob/ u pa li/ chos la phyogs pas so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis spu can
387a1('dul ba): las chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs na/ byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bgyi'am/ gos gzhan zhig yod na ni/ byin gyis ma rlobs shig /byin gyis brlabs
387a2('dul ba): na ni/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis nas dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bdag nyid kyis bdag gir bgyis na/ cir 'gyur/
387a3('dul ba): nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge 'dun dbyar gyi nang logs su mchod rten gyi rnyed pa bgos kyang nongs par mi 'gyur zhing rung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u
387a4('dul ba): pa li/ yod de/ nyan thos kyi mchod rten la bsngos par gyur pa ni/ shi ba'i yo byad pas na/ bgo bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gum pa'i yo byad mtshams kyi nang na
387a5('dul ba): 'khod pas bgo bar gyis shig / ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis gum pa'i yo byad byin gyis brlabs te mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis na/ gum pa'i yo byad kyi skal ba
387a6('dul ba): stsal tam/ u pa li/ sbyin no/ /de ste byin gyis ma brlabs par mchis na/ stsal tam/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ gum pa'i yo byad dang gos byin gyis ma brlabs
387a7('dul ba): par dge slong gzhan dag cig mchis na/ de dag la gum pa'i yo byad kyi skal pa stsal par bgyi'am/ u pa li/ sbyin par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ de ste byin gyis brlabs nas mchis
387b1('dul ba): na| stsal par bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gum pa'i yo byad rnams gsol ba dang las kyis byin gyis rlobs shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun
387b2('dul ba): pa| gnas gang na dge slong gcig pu mchis na/ de ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ u pa li/ dge slong des sems bskyed nas tshig tu smra bar bya ste/ bgo ba'i las rdzas 'di ni/
387b3('dul ba): bdag gis 'thob pas na/ bdag gis chos gos 'di bsdu bar bgyi'o/ /bdag gir bya'o/ /'di ni/ byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /zhes byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /gnas gang na dge
387b4('dul ba): slong gnyis sam gsum yang rung gnas na/ de dag kyang gcig la gcig smra bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gos ma dras pa la byin gyis brlab tu rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/

387b7('dul ba): pa gtan par bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /gos rnying pa gang zhe na/ gang gis sngar dge

393a7('dul ba): 'bab par mi dogs par gyur pa dang / dus ma yin par grong gzhan nam/ grong khyer gzhan nam/ klung rgal 'dod par gyur pa dang / klung gi drung ngam khron pa'i drung na mi gnas pa'o/ /
