393b6('dul ba): yang dge slong gzhi pa de dag gis de nyid kyi nya bri'i zhag cig la gtan pa bting bar gyur pa dang / dge slong glo bur pa mang zhig lhags nas de dag ni/ de'i nyin mo bco lngar gyur te gso sbyong
393b7('dul ba): byed/ so sor thar pa klog pa dang / de ste dge slong gzhi pa rnams kyang de dag gi rjes su zhugs nas gso sbyong byas na/ gsol ba dang las ma byas par gtan pa phyung ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/
394a1('dul ba): dge slong gzhi pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting ste mtshams kyi slad rol du mchis pa dang / glo bur du dge slong rnams lhags te gtan pa phyung na/ phyung ba zhes bgyi'am/
394a2('dul ba): u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ gang gis gtan pa bting ba de nyid kyis gtan pa phyung ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar tshul du zhugs pa las dge 'dun bye na/ gang gis
394a3('dul ba): gtan pa gding / chos bzhin du smra ba rnams kyis so/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa bting ba'i gnas su dge 'dun bye na/ dbyar gyi rnyed pa sus 'thob/ phyogs gnyis kas so/ /btsun pa/ de ste mngon
394a4('dul ba): du gyur pa las rnyed na/ sus 'thob/ chos kyi phyogs kyis so/ /btsun pa/ tshad las chung ba'i chos gos dum bur sbyar te gos su btsem zhing gtan par bting na/ gtan par bting ba zhes
394a5('dul ba): bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ tshad las chung ba zhig gtan par bting na/ gtan par bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/
394a6('dul ba): gos ji lta bus gtan pa gding bar bgyi/ u pa li/ mchur lnga/ zheng du gsum pas so/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa bting ba khyim pa zhig gis gtan pa bting na/ gtan pa bting ba zhes
394a7('dul ba): bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du gtan pa 'ding ba ma ning dang / mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa nas sngar
394b1('dul ba): 'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag gis gtan pa bting na/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa
394b2('dul ba): bting ba za ma zhig gis gtan pa bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa 'ding ba dge 'dun
394b3('dul ba): gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang
394b4('dul ba): bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa 'ding ba smyon ba zhig gis gtan pa bting na/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma bting ba zhes bya'o/ /de ste dge slong gi 'du shes yod
394b5('dul ba): la| bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyi gtan pa gding ngo / /bdag gis bting ngo / /zhes sems bskyed na/ gtan pa bting ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang /
394b6('dul ba): nad kyis gzir ba rnams su shes par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa 'ding ba glen pa dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa rnams kyis gtan pa bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/
394b7('dul ba): bting ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa 'ding ba gzhan du gnas pas gtan pa bting na/ bting ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bting ba zhes
395a1('dul ba): bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /gtan pa'i dngos po rdzogs so// //mdor na/ gang du gang gis mtshams bzhi dang / /bsgo ba gos dang
395a2('dul ba): gso sbyong bzhi/ /gtan bzhi bye ba gang zag go /btsun pa/ yul ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge 'dun gang gi tshe bye bar gyur/ nam mtshams kyi nang na gcig pu gnas pa las gso sbyong byed pa dang / dge
395a3('dul ba): 'dun gyi bya ba dang / dge 'dun gyi don rnams tha dad par byas pa na'o/ /btsun pa/ yul ko'u sham+b+hir dang po dge 'dun gang gis phye/ chos ma yin par smras pas/ de dag gis thog mar
395a4('dul ba): mtshams kyi nang du gso sbyong dang / dge 'dun gyi bya ba dang dge 'dun gyi don rnams tha dad par byas pas so/ /btsun pa/ yul ko'u sham+b+hi pas mtshams bshig na/ mtshams zhig pa zhes
395a5('dul ba): bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ de ste yul yangs pa can na gnas pas mtshams bshig na/ mtshams zhig pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong
395a6('dul ba): ma'i dge 'dun bye nas phyogs dang / gzhan gyi phyogs su gnas pa la zla ba phyed phyed cing lung dbog pa dang bstan par bgyi'am/ btsun pa/ 'di skad du/ sring mo rnams je mthun par gyis
395a7('dul ba): shig / ces sgos shig /btsun pa/ dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bye nas phyogs su gnas pa'i dge slong ma dag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing lung 'bog cing bstan pa btsal bar bgyi'am/ btsal
395b1('dul ba): bar bya'o/ /su las btsal/ chos phyogs pa las so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun bye nas phyogs gnyis su gnas pa dag gis dge slong ma dag la lung 'bog cing bstan pa stsal bar bgyi'am/
395b2('dul ba): dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mi bye bar bya ba'i phyir byin cig /btsun pa/ yul ko'u sham+b+hir phyogs gnyis ka 'dus shing 'khod par byed na/ gzu bos gang du dge slong ma la lung dbog par bgyi/
395b3('dul ba): mtshams kyi phyi rol song ba'o/ /btsun pa/ yul ko'u sham+b+hir phyogs gnyis ka 'dus shing 'khod par gyur la/ dge slong gzu bo dag kyang mtshams kyi slad rol tu mchis par gyur ba dang / khyim
395b4('dul ba): bdag cig mchis nas dge 'dun la gos shig phul na/ gang gis 'thob/ phyogs gnyis kas so/ /yul ko'u sham+b+hi na gnas pas yul yangs pa can na gnas pa dag dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong
395b5('dul ba): bgyid na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /yul yangs pa can na gnas pas yul ko'u sham+b+hi pa dag dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong bgyid na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes
395b6('dul ba): bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /gzu bo rnams yul ko'u sham+b+hi na gnas pa dag dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong bgyid na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /gzu
395b7('dul ba): bo dag yul yangs pa can na gnas pa dang lhan cig tu gso sbyong bgyid na/ gso sbyong bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de ste byed na/ gzu bo'i dngos po med do/ /btsun
396a1('dul ba): pa| gtan pa bting ba'i gnas su dge 'dun bye na/ gtan pa gang gis gding bar bgyi/ chos su smra ba dag gis so/ /btsun pa/ gtan pa bting ba'i gnas su
396a2('dul ba): dge 'dun bye na/ gtan pa gang gis dbyung bar bgyi/ chos su smra ba rnams kyis so/ /btsun pa/ gang nye bar phyogs pa de thams cad so sor gnas pa lags sam/ nye bar phyogs pa
396a3('dul ba): gnas pa ma yin pa'ang yod/ so sor gnas la nye bar phyogs pa yang yod/ nye bar phyogs la so sor gnas pa'ang yod/ nye bar yang ma phyogs la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa'ang yod
396a4('dul ba): do| |nye bar phyogs la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa ni/ gang dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs par gyur pa ste/ ma mthong ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyis spangs par ma gyur pa dang / slar las
396a5('dul ba): ma byas pa'i phyir spangs par ma gyur pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par ma gyur pa'o/ /so sor gnas la nye bar ma phyogs pa ni/ 'di ltar dge slong de ma mthong ba'i phyir
396a6('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis spangs par gyur pa dang / slar las ma byas pa'i phyir dang / sdig par lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par gyur pa dang / dngos po lnga la yang nye bar phyogs par ma gyur
396a7('dul ba): pa'o/ /nye bar yang phyogs la so sor yang gnas pa ni/ de 'di ltar dge slong de dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs par yang gyur la/ ma mthong ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyis kyang spangs par
396b1('dul ba): gyur pa dang / slar las ma byas pa'i phyir dang / sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par gyur pa'o/ /nye bar phyogs pa'ang ma yin la so sor gnas pa'ang ma yin pa ni/ rnam pa de lta bu dag
396b2('dul ba): ma gtogs pa'o/ /gang nye bar phyogs pa de na/ cang mi gnas pa lags sam/ nye bar phyogs pa mi gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod/ mi gnas la nye bar phyogs pa yang yod/ nye bar yang phyogs
396b3('dul ba): la mi gnas pa yang yod/ nye bar yang ma phyogs la mi gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod do/ /nye bar phyogs la mi gnas pa ma yin pa ni/ 'di ltar dge slong de dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs
396b4('dul ba): par gyur la phas pham pa bzhi'i nyes pa gang yang rung ba byung bar ma gyur pa'o/ /mi gnas la nye bar yang ma phyogs pa ni/ de 'di ltar dge slong de phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung ba'i
396b5('dul ba): nyes pa byung bar gyur la/ dngos po lnga la ni/ nye bar ma phyogs pa yin no/ /nye bar yang phyogs la mi gnas pa yang yin pa ni/ 'di ltar dge slong de dngos po lnga la nye bar phyogs par gyur
396b6('dul ba): cing / phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung ba yin no/ /nye bar phyogs pa yang ma yin la mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa ni/ rnam pa de lta bu ma gtogs pa'o/ /gang so
396b7('dul ba): sor gnas pa de thams cad mi gnas pa lags sam/ so sor gnas pa la mi gnas pa ma yin pa'ang yod/ mi gnas la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa yang yod/ so sor yang
397a1('dul ba): gnas la mi gnas pa yang yod/ gnas la so sor yang mi gnas pa yang yod do/ /so sor gnas la mi gnas pa ma yin pa ni/ 'di ltar dge slong de ma
397a2('dul ba): mthong ba'i phyir spangs par gyur cing / /slar las ma byas pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par gyur la/ phas pham pa bzhi las nyes pa gang yang rung ba ma byung ba
397a3('dul ba): yin no/ /mi gnas la so sor gnas pa ma yin pa ni/ gang 'di ltar dge slong des phas pham pa bzhi'i nyes pa gang yang rung ba byung bar gyur gyi/ ma mthong ba'i phyir dge 'dun gyis
397a4('dul ba): spangs pa ma byas par gyur cing / slar las ma byas pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba ma btang ba'i phyir spangs par ma gyur ba'o/ /mi gnas la so sor yang gnas pa ni/ de 'di ltar dge
397a5('dul ba): slong de ma mthong ba'i phyir spangs pa yang yin la/ phas pham pa bzhi'i nyes pa gang yang rung ba byung bar gyur ba'o/ /mi gnas pa'ang ma yin la so sor gnas pa'ang ma yin pa ni/ rnam
397a6('dul ba): pa de lta bu ma gtogs pa'o/ btsun pa/ dge slong nyid kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun 'byed kyi/ dge slong mas ma lags/ dge slob mas ma lags/ dge tshul mas ma lags/ dge
397a7('dul ba): tshul pas ma lags sam/ u pa li/ dge slong nyid kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun 'byed kyi/ dge slong mas ma yin/ dge slob mas ma yin/ dge tshul mas ma yin/ dge
397b1('dul ba): tshul phas ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dge slong rnams ni/ dge 'dun dbye ba'i phyir rtsol lo/ /btsun pa/ dge slong ma nyid kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'byed kyi/ dge slong gis ma lags/
397b2('dul ba): dge slob mas ma lags/ dge tshul mas ma lags/ dge tshul phas ma lags sam/ u pa li/ dge slong ma nyid kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'byed kyi/ dge slong phas ma yin/
397b3('dul ba): dge slob mas ma yin/ dge tshul mas ma yin/ dge tshul phas ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dge slong rnams ni/ dge 'dun dbye ba'i phyir rtsol lo/ /btsun pa/ dbye ba ni/ gang kha na ma
397b4('dul ba): tho dang ldan pa ni/ gang lags/ dbye ba ni/ dge 'dun no/ /kha na ma tho ba dang ldan pa ni/ 'byed pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun phye na/ cir 'gyur/ sbom po ste/ gsol pa dang / las ma
397b5('dul ba): mnyan na/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'o/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ dge 'dun phye ba zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ gang gi tshe ji snyed pa'i dge slong rnams mtshams su byi na/ bya ba la bab
397b6('dul ba): par gyur/ de dag thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur/ dad pa blang ba'i rigs pa las dad pa blangs par gyur/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang yin
397b7('dul ba): par 'du shes te gso sbyong dang las tha dad du byed pa de ltar na/ dge 'dun bye ba zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun phye bas nongs pa gang bshags par bgyi/ nye pa sbom po'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom
398a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i gang zag la gleng bar ma bya zhig / dran par ma bya zhig /ces gsungs na/ de lta bu'i gang zag gang lags/ gang zag gang mdo sde 'dzin pa/
398a2('dul ba): ma lta bu 'dzin pa/ bsod nams chen po/ 'khor g.yogs mang po/ grags pa de'o/ /de lta bu'i gang zag cig spangs na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes pa sbom bor 'gyur ro/ /yul ko'u sham+b+hi'i dngos
398a3('dul ba): po rdzogs so/ / //'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa/ mdor na/ skad dang nam mkha' mtshams dang sa/ /chos gnyis dang ni ma 'dus pa/ /chad pa 'khor dang gcig nas gcig/
398a4('dul ba): ma 'dus gang zag gnas de bzhin/ btsun pa/ 'phags pa zhig gis 'phags pa'i skad du las bgyis pa dang / dge slong de dag gis kyang 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ las
398a5('dul ba): bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ las byas pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa'i dge slong ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ 'phags pa zhig gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du
398a6('dul ba): las bgyis pa dang / dge slong de dag gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ las byas pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa ni/ 'das pa dang /
398a7('dul ba): bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ mtha' 'khob pa zhig gis mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du las bgyis pa dang / dge slong de dag gis kyang mtha' 'khob pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ las bgyis
398b1('dul ba): pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ las byas pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ mtha' 'khob pa zhig gis 'phags pa'i skad du las bgyis pa dang / dge slong
398b2('dul ba): de dag gis 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ las byas pa zhes bya ste/ las byed pa ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas
398b3('dul ba): pas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i grangs su bskangs na/ las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ nam mkha' la gnas pas sa la gnas pa'i grangs su bskangs na/
398b4('dul ba): las bgyis rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa sa la gnas pas nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams kyi las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / btsun pa/
398b5('dul ba): las bgyid pa nam mkha' la gnas pas sa la gnas pa rnams kyi las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na
398b6('dul ba): gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig bzhir bya'o/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pas sa la gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ste/ 'di ltar yang des sa la
398b7('dul ba): gnas pas grangs bskangs shing sa la gnas pa rnams las dad pa blangs par gyur pa'o/ /ji ltar sa la gnas pas sa la gnas pa dang lhan cig pa de bzhin du sa la gnas pa dang rtsig
399a1('dul ba): pa la gnas par ro/ /sal gnas pa dang shing la gnas par ro/ /rtsig pa la gnas pa dang rtsig pa la gnas par ro/ /rtsig pa la gnas pa dang sa la gnas par
399a2('dul ba): ro| |rtsig pa la gnas pa dang shing la gnas par ro/ /shing la gnas pa dang shing la gnas par ro/ /shing la gnas pa dang sa la gnas par ro/ /shing la gnas pa dang rtsig pa la gnas
399a3('dul ba): pa lhan cig tu las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ste/ ji ltar yang shing la gnas pa rnams kyis grangs su bskangs te sa la gnas pa rnams las dad pa blangs par gyur pa'o/ /
399a4('dul ba): las rnam pa bzhi ste/ chos bzhin ma yin par byed cing ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin ma yin par 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin du ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin du 'dus pa'o/ /chos
399a5('dul ba): bzhin ma yin par ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba byas nas las ma bsgrags te ma 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin par 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba byas nas
399a6('dul ba): las ma bsgrags par 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin du ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba byas la las bsgrags pa dang / ma 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin du 'dus
399a7('dul ba): pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba byas shing las bsgrags la 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /gzhan yang / las rnam pa bzhi ste/ chos bzhin ma yin par mthun la ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin
399b1('dul ba): ma yin par mthun la 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin du mthun la ma 'dus pa dang / chos bzhin du mthun la 'dus pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin par mthun la ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ sngar
399b2('dul ba): las bsgrags la phyis gsol ba byed cing ma 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin par mthun zhing 'dus pa gang zhe na/ sngar bsgrags la phyis gsol ba byed cing
399b3('dul ba): 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos bzhin du mthun la ma 'dus pa gang zhe na/ las de nyid kyis gsol ba byas te las gzhan bsgrags la ma 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /chos
399b4('dul ba): bzhin du mthun la 'dus pa gang zhe na/ las de nyid kyis gsol ba byas shing las gzhan bsgrags la 'dus par yang gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ ma 'dus pa'i las zhes kyang bgyi/
399b5('dul ba): 'dus pa'i las zhes kyang bgyi na/ btsun pa/ ma 'dus pa'i las gang lags/ u pa li/ dge slong ji snyed pa rnams kyis mtshams su yang phyin/ las la yang bab par gyur/ thams
399b6('dul ba): cad mngon sum du 'dus par gyur/ dad pa blang ba'i rigs pa yang dad pa blangs par gyur na/ dge slong rnams ni/ zlog cing 'khyal te/ de dag slar zlog cing 'khyal bzhin
399b7('dul ba): du las byas na/ de ni/ ma 'dus pa'i las zhes bya'o/ /'dus pa'i las gang zhe na/ dge slong ji snyed pa rnams mtshams su phyin cing las la bab par gyur/ thams cad kyang
400a1('dul ba): mngon sum du 'dus par gyur/ dad pa blang ba'i rigs pa yang dad pa blangs par gyur/ dge slong dag slar mi zlog cing 'khyal bar mi byed de/ de dag
400a2('dul ba): slar mi zlog cing mi 'khyal bzhin du las byed pas na/ de ni/ 'dus pa'i las zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'khod nas las bgyis kyang las de ma
400a3('dul ba): 'dus pa'i las su 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ de ni/ 'di ltar gsol ba dang / las byed pa na/ dge slong dag slar zlog cing 'khyal te dge slong slar zlog cing
400a4('dul ba): 'khyal bzhin las byed pa'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa chad pa 'khor ba zhig gis las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun
400a5('dul ba): rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ chad pa 'khor ba zhig gis dad pa blangs nas las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge
400a6('dul ba): slong de dag ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dad pa gcig nas gcig tu blangs te las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun
400a7('dul ba): rnams ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ ma 'dus par las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma byas zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun yang 'das pa dang bcas
400b1('dul ba): pa'o| |btsun pa/ gcig gis gcig la/ gcig gis gnyis la/ gcig gis gsum la/ gcig gis mang po la las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ gnyis kyis
400b2('dul ba): gcig la/ gnyis kyis gnyis la/ gnyis kyis gsum la/ gnyis kyis mang po la las rnams bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ gsum gyis gcig la/ gsum gyis
400b3('dul ba): gnyis la/ gsum gyis gsum la/ gsum gyis mang po la las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ mang pos mang po la las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung
400b4('dul ba): ngo / /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa gnas gcig tu mchis la gnas bzhir las thams cad bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ste/ de 'di ltar las byed pa'i dge slong des gnas
400b5('dul ba): bzhi char gyi mtshams shing ngam/ 'dam bu'am/ re ldes mnan te las byed pa'o/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pas mtshams gcig par gsol ba gcig dang / las gcig gis
400b6('dul ba): gang zag bzhi la las bgyis na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshams gcig par mang pos mang po la las byar mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/
400b7('dul ba): dge slong gis mtshams gcig la mtshungs par gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la las bgyis kyang nongs par yang mi 'gyur la/ dge 'dun ma 'dus par yang mi 'gyur ba mchis
401a1('dul ba): sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ dad pa byin pas so/ /btsun pa/ las bgyid pa'i dge slong gnas gcig na mchis pas gang zag bzhi la las bgyis na/ las de yang
401a2('dul ba): bgyis par 'gyur la/ dge slong de dag kyang 'das pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar las byed pa'i dge slong de mtshams mnan/ mtshams

401a7('dul ba): smyon pa'i sdom pa byin par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ sngar las bsgrags te phyis gsol ba bgyid na/ bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ byas pa zhes bya ste/ dge slong de dag ni/
401b1('dul ba): 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bdag nyid kyis bdag spangs na/ spangs pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ spangs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bdag nyid kyis spangs te bdag nyid kyis bdag
401b2('dul ba): nyid la bzod par bgyid na/ bzod pa bgyid pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bzod pa byas pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa la bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa zhes

407b2('dul ba): ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar yang dge slong des thun mongs ma yin pa'i dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa byung bar gyur pa dang / de'i mtshan 'phos te dge slong mar gyur nas dge
407b3('dul ba): 'dun gyi lhag ma byung ba dang / de slar yang mtshan 'phos te dge slong du gyur na/ nyes pa de bshags dgos so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig chad pa spyod pa las de mtshan 'phos te dge slong
407b4('dul ba): mar gyur na/ chad pa bral ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ dge slong ma la chad pa bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong de yid mgu bar bgyi ba spyod pa na mtshan 'phos te dge slong mar gyur na/
407b5('dul ba): chad pa bral ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ ji tsam du spyad pa de bgrangs la dge 'dun sde gnyis la zla ba phyed du skongs shig /btsun pa/ dge slong ma zhig chad pa spyod pa na mtshan
407b6('dul ba): 'phos te dge slong phar gyur na/ chad pa bral ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ dge slong pha la chad pa byos shig /btsun pa/ dge slong ma zhig yid mgu bar bgyi ba spyod pa na
407b7('dul ba): mtshan 'phos te dge slong phar gyur na/ chad pa bral ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ zhag drug tu bgrangs la phyung zhig /btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal pas dge slong la chad pa
408a1('dul ba): bgyi ba dang / yid mgu bar bgyi ba stsal par rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal pa la chad pa bgyi ba dang / yid mgu bar bgyi ba
408a2('dul ba): stsal ba rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /mdor na/ nyes dang de bzhin mtshan mo dang / /skad rnams dang yang bzhi pa dang / /lus dang dben dang de bzhin sngags/ /bzhi pa gnyis dang sbyangs
408a3('dul ba): pa'o/ /btsun pa/ nongs pa dang bcas pas dge slong la chad pa bgyi ba dang / yid mgu bar bgyi ba stsal bar rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ nongs pa dang bcas pa las chad
408a4('dul ba): par bgyi'am/ yid mgu bar bgyi ba spyad du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /de bzhin du grangs su skong ba'ang brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ chad pa bgyid pa bzhi gnas gcig na chad pa bgyid
408a5('dul ba): dam/ yid mgu bar bgyi ba spyod du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ste/ mang pos mang po la chad par bya ba'am/ yid mgu bar bya ba mi spyad do/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ chad pa byed pa
408a6('dul ba): gnas gzhan du ma gnas shig / ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ de ste gnas gzhan du gnas na/ zhag bgrang bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ 'phags pa zhig gis 'phags
408a7('dul ba): pa'i skad du dge slong la nongs par smras pa dang / dge slong des kyang 'phags pa'i skad ma 'tshal na/ smras pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /bcabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ mi

408b6('dul ba): ram| u pa li/ mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis sman nam/ sngags kyis bdag mi snang bar bgyis te nongs pa smras na/ smras pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /bcabs
408b7('dul ba): par 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pa dag gis nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams la chad pa bgyi'am/ yid mgu bar bgyi'am/ dbyung ba'i las kyang rung bgyid

409a2('dul ba): mgu bar bgyi ba'am/ dbyung ba'i las kyang rung bgyid na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ sa la gnas pa dag gis nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams
409a3('dul ba): kyi grangs su bskangs te chad pa bgyi ba'am/ yid mgu bar bgyi ba'am/ dbyung ba'i las kyang rung bgyid na/ las bgyis pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ nam

409a5('dul ba): ba'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pa rnams su lhan cig rnam pa bzhir byos shig// //'dul ba
409a6('dul ba): gzhung dam pa/ bam po nyi shu pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum po 'di rnams las/ khu ba las
409a7('dul ba): byung ba zhag gcig bcabs pa nas chig bka' blo mi bde ba las byung ba zhag bcu gsum bcabs pa'i bar du ste/ btsun pa/ nongs pa bcu gsum po de dag dus tha dad pa mi 'dra bar bcabs
409b1('dul ba): pa rnams la gsol ba gcig dang / las gcig gis chad pa bgyid du stsal bar rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ chad pa 'khor nas yid mgu bar bgyid du stsal bar rung ngam/

410b2('dul ba): u pa li/ yod de/ ji ltar dge slong gis phas pham pa bzhi'i nyes pa las gang yang rung ste/ 'das pa de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa zhig byung ba'o// //mdor na/
410b3('dul ba): smyon pa sems 'khrugs na ba dang / /'on glen gnyid log ra ro ba/ /myos dang snyoms zhugs 'gro ba mtshan/ /ma ning dag la sogs pa dang / /bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/ /btsun pa/ smyon pa zhig

413a1('dul ba): par bya de bzhin/ /skabs 'byed pa dang smra bar bya/ /lung dbog pa dang 'gog pa dang / /gso sbyong dag dang skabs dbye ba'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs

413b5('dul ba): chos bzhin ma yin pas gso sbyong dgag pa gcig gang zhe na/ byas pa la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /byas pa la gzhi yod pas
413b6('dul ba): gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa gcig dang / chos bzhin yang gcig go /chos bzhin ma yin pa gnyis
413b7('dul ba): dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa gnyis po gang zhe na/ ji ltar yang de ni/ dge slong gis dge slong la byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / ma byas pa la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog
414a1('dul ba): pa ni/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / ma byas pa la gzhi yod pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du
414a2('dul ba): gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa gsum dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa gsum gang zhe na/ ji ltar yang de ni/ dge slong gis dge slong la byas pa la gzhi med pa dang /
414a3('dul ba): ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / ma byas pa la
414a4('dul ba): gzhi yod pa dang / byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa bzhi dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong
414a5('dul ba): 'gog pa bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa la gzhi med pa bzhis gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin ma
414a6('dul ba): yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa la gzhi yod pa bzhis gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos
414a7('dul ba): bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa lnga dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa lnga po gang zhe na/ phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dang / ltung ba dang / so
414b1('dul ba): sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas rnams la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dang / ltung ba dang /
414b2('dul ba): so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas rnams la gzhi yod pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa drug dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog
414b3('dul ba): pa drug po gang zhe na/ lhag ma yod pa byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma yod pa ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma yod pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma med
414b4('dul ba): pa byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma med pa ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso
414b5('dul ba): sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa drug po gang zhe na/ lhag ma yod pa byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma yod pa ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma yod pa byas pa dang
414b6('dul ba): ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma med pa ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma med pa byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pas gso sbyong
414b7('dul ba): 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa bdun dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa bdun po gang zhe na/ phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma
415a1('dul ba): dang / ltung ba dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin ma
415a2('dul ba): yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dang / ltung ba dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa la gzhi yod
415a3('dul ba): pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa brgyad dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa brgyad gang zhe na/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang / spyod
415a4('dul ba): pa nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pas byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams
415a5('dul ba): par ma byas pa la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /tshul khrims nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / 'tsho
415a6('dul ba): ba nyams par byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / spyod pa nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams par ma byas pa la gzhi yod pas gso
415a7('dul ba): sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog ba'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa dgu dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa gang zhe na/ lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa la
415b1('dul ba): gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma med pa byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma
415b2('dul ba): med pa ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma med pa dang lhag ma med pa byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang
415b3('dul ba): lhag ma med pa ma byas pa la gzhi med pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi med pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni chos bzhin ma yin pa'i gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /
415b4('dul ba): lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma med pa
415b5('dul ba): byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma med pa ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa byas
415b6('dul ba): pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa ma byas pa la gzhi yod pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang lhag ma med pa byas pa dang ma byas pa la gzhi yod pas gso sbyong
415b7('dul ba): 'gog pa ni chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin ma yin pa bcu dang / chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa bcu gang zhe na/ phas pham pa yin/ phas pham pa'i gtam la zhugs
416a1('dul ba): pa yin/ tshul khrims nyams pa yin/ lta ba nyams pa yin/ spyod pa nyams pa yin/ 'tsho ba nyams pa yin/ bslab pa phul ba yin/ bslab pa phul ba'i
416a2('dul ba): gtam la zhugs pa yin/ dge 'dun la dpyas 'dogs pa yin/ dge 'dun la dpyas 'dogs pa'i gtam la zhugs pa yin no/ /de la ji ltar na/ phas pham pa yin zhe na/ gang gi
416a3('dul ba): rnam pa dang / gang gi tshul dang / gang gi mtshan mas dge slong phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung ba de'i rnam pa dang / de'i tshul dang / de'i mtshan mas dge slong phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung
416a4('dul ba): par mthong ba yin no/ /de des mthong bas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa yin te/ de ltar na/ phas pham pa yin no/ /ji ltar na/ phas pham pa'i gtam la
416a5('dul ba): zhugs pa yin zhe na/ ji ltar yang de ni/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol yang rung / dge slong mang po 'dus shid 'khod par gyur pa rnams kyang de las byung ba/ de
416a6('dul ba): dang mthun pa/ de'i rang bzhin gyi gtam la zhugs pa yin te/ dad pa las thos kyang rung / bdag rang rnam pa la dogs pa skyes kyang rung ste/ de des thos pa dang / dogs pas gso sbyong
416a7('dul ba): 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /ji ltar na/ tshul khrims nyams pa yin zhe na/ phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung phas pham pa shin tu 'das par gyur pa'o/ /ji
416b1('dul ba): ltar na/ lta ba nyams pa yin zhe na/ lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis las gang yang rung ste/ lta bar 'gyur ba rab tu thob pa yin no/ /ji ltar na spyod pa nyams par gyur pa yin zhe na/ mi spyod pa rnams
416b2('dul ba): spyod pa ste/ dge slong gi bslab pa rnams la mi slob pa'o/ /ji ltar na/ 'tsho ba nyams pa yin zhe na/ 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa yin no/ /ji ltar bslab pa phul ba yin zhe na/ gang gi rnam pa dang /
416b3('dul ba): gang gi tshul dang / gang gi mtshan mas dge slong bslab pa 'bul bde'i rnam pa dang / de'i tshul dang / de'i mtshan mas dge slong du mthong ba yin te/ de des mthong nas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/
416b4('dul ba): chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /ji ltar na/ bslab pa phul ba'i gtam la zhugs pa yin zhe na/ ji ltar yang de ni/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol na'ang rung /
416b5('dul ba): dge slong rnams 'dus te 'khod pa de dag kyang de las byung ba/ de dang mthun pa/ de'i rang bzhin gyi gtam la zhugs pa yin te/ dad pa las thos kyang rung / bdag nyid rnam pa la dogs pa
416b6('dul ba): skyes kyang rung ste/ de des thos pa dang / de'i dogs pas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /ji ltar na/ dge 'dun la dpyas 'dogs pa yin zhe na/ gang gi
416b7('dul ba): rnam pa dang / gang gi tshul dang / gang gi mtshan mas dge slong gi dge 'dun la smod pa de lta bu'i rnam pa dang / de lta bu'i tshul dang / de lta bu'i mtshan mas dge 'dun la smod pa'i dge
417a1('dul ba): slong du mthong ba yin te/ de des mthong nas gso sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /ji ltar na/ dge 'dun la dpyas 'dogs pa'i gtam la
417a2('dul ba): zhugs pa yin zhe na/ ji ltar yang de ni/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu'ang rung / dge slong rnams 'dus te 'khod pa de dag kyang de las byung ba/ de dang
417a3('dul ba): mthun pa/ de'i rang bzhin gyi gtam la zhugs pa yin te/ dad pa las thos kyang rung / bdag rang rnam pa la dogs pa skyes kyang rung ste/ de des thos pa dang / de lta bu'i dogs pas gso
417a4('dul ba): sbyong 'gog pa ni/ chos bzhin du gso sbyong 'gog pa'o/ /chos bzhin bcu po 'di dag ldog pa ni/ chos bzhin ma yin par sbyar bar bya'o/ /gso sbyong dgag pa'i dngos po rdzogs
417a5('dul ba): so/ / //mdor na/ dge tshul lo ma lon pa gcig /kha dog ngan dang gnas de bzhin/ /ma bskos pa dang phyag bya ba/ /mngon sum rdul gzan med pa'o/ /btsun pa/
417a6('dul ba): dge tshul pha nyi tshe dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ de dag gis mal stan bgo bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de dag gis mal stan blang bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ blang bar ni/
417a7('dul ba): bya'o/ /btsun pa/ lo ma lon pa dag cig nyi tshe dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ de dag gis mal stan bgo bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de dag gis mal stan blang bar bgyi'am/
417b1('dul ba): u pa li/ blang bar ni/ bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ de dag gis mal stan bgo bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/
417b2('dul ba): de dag gis mal stan blang bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ blang bar ni/ bya'o/ /u pa li/ gang du dge slong lnga'am/ de las lhag par gnas na/ de dag gis gsol ba byas la mal stan bged
417b3('dul ba): ba skos shig / bskos pa des mal stan bgo'o/ /btsun pa/ mal stan de nyid spyad pas nongs par 'gyur ba dang / de nyid spyad pas nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/
417b4('dul ba): gang zag gis mal stan kha dog ngan par ma gyur pa'am/ kha tshar ring ba spyad na/ nyes pa dang bcas pa'o/ /dge 'dun gyi spyad na/ nyes pa med do/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
417b5('dul ba): slong gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan gnas gzhan du khyer zhing ma spyod cig / ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan gnas gzhan du 'tshal te spyad na/ cir
417b6('dul ba): 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /bar chad brgyad las gang yang rung ste bar chad gcig byung bar gyur pa dang / gnas de nyid du mal stan srung bar mi nus pa dang / gnas der mi gnas par sdom pa bcas pa la ni/ nyes
417b7('dul ba): pa med do/ /btsun pa/ ma bskos pas ma la stan bgo bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan de nyid spyad na/ nongs par 'gyur ba
418a1('dul ba): dang / de nyid spyad pas nongs par mi 'gyur ba ma chis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ spu phyir zlog ste gyon na/ nyes pa dang bcas pa'o/ /bting na/ nyes pa med do//
418a2('dul ba): rdul gzan med par gyon na/ nyes pa dang bcas pa'o/ /rdul gzan dang bcas par gyon na/ nyes pa med do/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad du nye bar phyogs pa dang
418a3('dul ba): gnas par mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ci/ nye bar ma phyogs pas nye bar phyogs pa rgan pa la yang phyag bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ nye bar phyogs pa thams cad kyis
418a4('dul ba): nye bar ma phyogs pa rnams la phyag byos shig / dge slong rnams kyi tha mar gzhag go /btsun pa/ ci/ de dag la mal stan kyang dge slong de dag gi tha mar stsal tam/ u pa li/ nye bar phyogs
418a5('dul ba): pa la rnyed pa dang mal stan byin pa med do/ /btsun pa/ mngon sum du ma gyur pa la mal stan stsal par bgyi'am/ kha cig la byin cig /kha cig la ma sbyin cig /gang la stsal bar bgyi/ song
418a6('dul ba): nas phyir 'ong ba la ni/ byin cig /su la mi stsal/ song nas phyir 'ong ba la ni/ ma sbyin cig /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi rdzas rdul gzan ma mchis par ma spyad
418a7('dul ba): cig / ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi rdzas rdul gzan ma mchis par spyad kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis dam/ a pa li/ yod de/ ji ltar yang de ni/ khyim bdag
418b1('dul ba): gcig gis g.yogs pa'am bgo ba zhig rdul gzan med par spyad par dge 'dun la phul ba yin no/ /mdor na/ kun dga' bo dang gang zag dang / /de ltar phyag dang rung ba dang / /tha ma dbyar du gnas pa
418b2('dul ba): dang / /sum cha dbri ba de bzhin te/ /khyim pa dag la sogs pa dang / /bslab pa byin pa tha ma 'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo khyod kyis mal stan lhag ma rnams bgos shig /ces
418b3('dul ba): gsungs na/ lhag pa gang lags/ gang gcig dang / gnyis po'i phyogs las lhag par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan rdul gzan ma mchis par
418b4('dul ba): ma spyad cig / ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gang zag gis mal stan spyad na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dang / gzhi pa
418b5('dul ba): rnams ji ltar rgan rim bzhin phyag byos shig / ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ de ste chad pa bgyid pa'i dge slong rgan pa la'ang phyag bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ phyag
418b6('dul ba): bya ba'i mi rigs pa thams cad la phyag mi bya ste/ 'khon yod pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /u pa li/ dge 'dun gyi nang na phyag bya ba'i mi rigs pa'i gang zag rnams gang zhe na/ bsdigs pa'i las
418b7('dul ba): byas pa dang / smad pa'i las byas pa dang / bskrad pa'i las byas pa dang / slar sdum pa'i las byas pa dang / ma mthong ba'i phyir spang ba'i las byas pa dang / las slar mi byed pa'i phyir spang
419a1('dul ba): ba'i las byas pa dang / sdig pa la lta ba slar ma sbangs pa'i phyir spang ba'i las byas pa dang / chad pa byed pa dang / gzhi nas bslangs te chad pa byed pa dang / chad pa
419a2('dul ba): 'khor ba dang / yid mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / gzhi nas bslangs te yid mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / khyim pa dang / ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha dang / ma dang / dgra
419a3('dul ba): bcom pa bsad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang / rkun gnas dang / mi gnas pa dang / so sor gnas pa dang /
419a4('dul ba): sngar nyes pa byung ba dang / sngon 'khrugs pa dang / nye bar phyogs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma dang / shin tu
419a5('dul ba): gzhon pa rnams la phyag ma byed cig / bshang ba byed pa la phyag mi bya'o/ /bshang ba byed pas phyag mi bya'o/ /gci ba byed pa la phyag mi bya'o/ /gci ba byed pas phyag mi bya'o/ /so shing za ba la phyag
419a6('dul ba): mi bya'o/ /so shing za bas phyag mi bya'o/ /zas za ba la phyag mi bya'o/ /zas za bas phyag mi bya'o/ /'thung ba la phyag mi bya'o/ /'thung bas phyag mi bya'o/ /sgren mo la phyag mi bya'o/ /sgren mos phyag mi bya'o//
419a7('dul ba): gos gcig pa la phyag mi bya'o/ /gos gcig pas phyag mi bya'o/ /mi snang bar 'dug pas phyag mi bya'o/ /mi bde bar 'dug pa la phyag mi bya'o/ /mi bde bar 'dug pas phyag mi bya'o/ /lung nod pa
419b1('dul ba): la zhugs pa'am/ yid la byed pa la zhugs pa'am/ chos nyan par zhugs pa la phyag mi bya'o/ /lung nod pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / chos nyan par zhugs pas phyag mi bya'o/ /yengs pa la phyag
419b2('dul ba): mi bya'o/ /khyim gyi nang du zhugs pa la phyag mi bya ste/ gang zag 'di dag ni/ phyag bya bar mi rigs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi khri'am/ khri'u la mchis sam/ nyal yang
419b3('dul ba): nongs pa ltung bar mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ mi rung ba la 'dug gam/ nyal ba ste/ gang dge slong rnams kyis spyad par mi rung ba'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang chad
419b4('dul ba): pa bgyid pa'i dge slong ni/ dge slong rnams kyis tha mar stsal tam/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ rim gyis sbyin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dbyar med pa dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa
419b5('dul ba): rnams la mal stan sngar byin cig / de'i 'og tu spangs pa'i rnams la'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ de ste mal stan lhag par gyur na/ rang bzhin du gnas pa dang lhan cig tu stsal tam/ u pa li/ mi sbyin no//
419b6('dul ba): btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis gnas bzhi nas mal stan blangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ ji ltar yang de ni/ dge slong zhig gis gnas bzhi'i mtshams shing
419b7('dul ba): ngam/ 'dam bu'am/ re ldes mnan te dbyar tshul du zhugs pa yin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul pha rnams ni/ rnyed pa'i sum cha byin cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ci/
420a1('dul ba): mal stan yang sum cha stsal tam/ u pa li/ ma yin te/ skal pa mnyam par byin cig /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dge slong gsar bu rnams kyis
420a2('dul ba): rgan po rnams las sngon du mal stan ma blang zhig / ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong gzhon nus rgan pa las sngar mal stan blangs kyang nongs par mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/
420a3('dul ba): gang gis dge 'dun las gnas kyi gnang ba thob pa dang / nye g.yog gi gnang ba thob pa yin/ 'jigs pa'i sa nas thos te 'ongs pa yin no/ /btsun pa/ khyim pa mal stan 'god par bsko'am
420a4('dul ba): u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du zam nas bslab pa stsal pa'i bar du rgyas par mal stan 'god par bsko'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ smyon pa mal stan 'god par bsko'am/
420a5('dul ba): u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa rnams so/ /btsun pa/ 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa dag mal stan
420a6('dul ba): 'god par bsko'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ ma ning la mal stan stsal tam/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du dge slong ma sun phyung ba nas sngar 'khrugs pa'i bar du de dag la
420a7('dul ba): mal stan stsal tam/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa la mal stan stsal tam/ u pa li/ byin cig /btsun pa/ smyon pa la
420b1('dul ba): mal stan stsal tam/ u pa li/ de ste spyad pa bzhin du mi spyad na/ ma spyin cig /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs pa dang /
420b2('dul ba): 'on pa rnams la yang brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/ mal stan 'god par dge slong bsko ba'i tshe mtshan 'phos na/ bskos pa zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bskos pa zhes bya'o/ /des mal
420b3('dul ba): stan bsko bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /mal stan gyi dngos po rdzogs so// //'du ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po nyer gcig pa/ mdor na/ gsum du byas pa'i gzu
420b4('dul ba): bo dang / /rnam par zhi ba'i mtshan de bzhin/ /gso sbyong dag gi mngon sum dag /'byung ba dag kyang de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ gzu
420b5('dul ba): bo chos du dang ldan na/ 'dul ba 'dzin cing rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyid nas pa lags/ u pa li/ bcu gcig ste/ bcu gcig gang zhe na/ rtsod pa shes/ rtsod pa ci la byung ba shes/
420b6('dul ba): rtsod pa bsdu ba shes/ rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba shes/ rtsod pa shin tu zhi bas phyis mi 'byung bar shes/ 'byung ba shes/ bcas pa shes/ rdzes su bcas pa shes/ dgag pa shes/ mngon
420b7('dul ba): par rjes su gnang ba shes/ las byas pa dang ma byas pa shes pa ste/ u pa li/ chos bcu gcig po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i gzu bo ni/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar byed nus
421a1('dul ba): pa yin no/ /gzhan yang chos bcu gcig ste/ bcu gcig po gang zhe na/ nyes pa shes/ nyes pa med pa shes/ nyes pa lci ba shes/ nyes pa yang
421a2('dul ba): ba shes/ nyes pa byung ba shes/ nyes pa las dbyung ba shes/ 'dod pa'i phyir mi 'gro/ zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti mug gi phyir mi 'gro ba dang / chad pa'i las
421a3('dul ba): bya ba dang mi bya ba shes pa ste/ u pa li/ bcu gcig po 'di dag gis rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i bar du rgyas par ro/ /gzhan yang chos bcu gcig gi bar du ste/ bcu gcig
421a4('dul ba): po gang zhe na/ mdo sde la mkhas pa yin/ 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ lung la zhugs pa yin/ mdo sde 'byed pa yin/
421a5('dul ba): 'khrul ba mi 'dzin pa yin/ gsang ba'i tshig mi 'dzin pa yin/ gdon mi za bar 'dzin pa yin/ tshig mang po mi 'dzin pa yin/ dam bcas pa 'dzin pa yin/ lan
421a6('dul ba): gsum gyi bar du gzhog pa yin te/ u pa li/ chos bcu gcig po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i gzu bo ni/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar byed nus pa yin no/ /chos
421a7('dul ba): du dang ldan pas rtsod pa shin tu zhi ba lags/ u pa li/ nyi shu rtsa gcig ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig po gang zhe na/ dge 'dun la bsgo ba yin/ chos dang bcas pas rgyal po'i
421b1('dul ba): bka' dang mthun pa yin/ phyogs dang pha rol gyi phyogs kyi dge slong dag go bar byed pa yin/ rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong la chos dang mthun pas rgol ba dang / phyir rgol
421b2('dul ba): ba'i dge slong la 'dul ba ma nyams par byed pa yin/ mi gtsang ba'i gang zag gi nyes pa dang ma bcas pa yin/ byung ba chud ma gsan pa yin/ bcas pa chud ma gsan pa yin/
421b3('dul ba): rjes su bcas pa chud ma gsan pa yin/ dgag pa chud ma gsan pa yin/ mngon par rjes su gnang ba chud ma gsan pa yin/ nyes pa chud ma gsan pa yin/ rgol ba'i dge slong gi
421b4('dul ba): yi dam shin tu bzung ba yin/ lan 'debs pa'i yi dam shing tu bzung ba yin/ mdo sde'i tshig kyang bstan pa yin/ 'dul ba dang mthun pa yin/ chos kyi mig rjes su bzung
421b5('dul ba): ba yin/ bskos nas rnam par zhi bar byed pa yin/ nyes pa ston pa yin/ chad pa'i las dmigs su bab pa yin/ rnam par dag pa ston pa yin/ chos dang / 'dul ba dang / ston
421b6('dul ba): pa'i bstan pas rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba yin te/ u pa li/ chos nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di rnams dang ldan na/ rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ rgol ba'am/ slar rgol
421b7('dul ba): ba'i dge slong mtshan 'phos na/ rtsod bzhi ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsod pa byung ba byung ma thag tu rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos
422a1('dul ba): bdun gyis rnam par zhi bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ rtsod pa rnam pa bzhi las gang yang rung ste/ rtsod pa zhig byung na/ rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid
422a2('dul ba): pa'i chos bdun po las gang yang rung ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar bgyid pa'i chos kyis rnam par zhi bar ma bgyis par rnam par zhi bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ de ni/
422a3('dul ba): mthun pa'i gso sbyong ngo / /btsun pa/ rtsod pa bzhi las gang yang rung ste rtsod pa zhig byung na/ rgol ba dang / slar rgol ba'i dge slong rnams las gang gi tshig gzung bar bgyi/
422a4('dul ba): rgan rim gyis gzung ngo / /btsun pa/ de ste gnyis ka'i lo grangs mnyam na/ gang gi tshig gzung bar bgyi/ gang mang du thos pa yin no/ /btsun pa/ de ste gnyis ka'ang gzhung
422a5('dul ba): la mtshungs par gyur na/ gang gi tshig gzung bar bgyi/ gang byang ba yin no/ /de ste gnyis ka byang bar gyur na/ gang gi tshig gzung bar bgyi/ gang byang ba'i shas che ba yin te/ de'i
422a6('dul ba): tshig gis rtsod pa rnams rnam par zhi bar bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang tshul shing mang pos rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba las/ gang gi phyogs su tshul shing gcig gis
422a7('dul ba): kyang lhag par gyur na/ de'i phyogs des rnam par zhi bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ de ste phyogs gnyis ka tshul shing mnyam par gyur na/ gang gi dbang gis rtsod pa rnams
422b1('dul ba): rnam par zhi bar bgyi/ u pa li/ phyogs gang gi dge slong dag phal cher byang ba'i shas che ba yin no/ /btsun pa/ gang dge slong rnams rtsod pa dge slong rnams kyis rnam par zhi bar bgyid
422b2('dul ba): ma nus na/ btsun pa/ dge slong mas rnam par zhi bar bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /de bzhin du sde lnga'i rnams phan tshun gcig la gcig sbyar bar bya'o/ /mdor na/ 'phrin pa spring
422b3('dul ba): yin lag brda dang / /gzhan zer ba dang gcig nas gcig /smyon pa sems 'khrugs na ba dang / /'on glen khyim pa dag la sogs/ /bslab pa byin pa tha ma 'o/ /btsun pa/ 'phrin
422b4('dul ba): gyis rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyis na/ rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du spring yig dang /
422b5('dul ba): lag brda dang / gzhan zer ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rnam par zhi bar bgyis na/ rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das
422b6('dul ba): pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ smyon pa zhig gis rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyis na/ rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/
422b7('dul ba): 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / nad kyis gzir ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa rnams kyis rnam par zhi bar bgyis na/
423a1('dul ba): rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ khyim pa zhig gis rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyis
423a2('dul ba): na/ rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ de bzhin du ma ning nas bslab pa stsal pa rnams kyi bar du rgyas par de
423a3('dul ba): dag gi rtsod pa rnam par zhi bar bgyis na/ rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ rnam par zhi ba zhes bya ste/ dge 'dun ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ rgol ba'am/ slar rgol ba dus
423a4('dul ba): bgyis na/ rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ rnam par zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du khyim pa lags par khas blangs pa nas bslab pa stsal pa lags pa'i bar du rgyas par khas
423a5('dul ba): blangs na/ rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ rnam par zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ rgol ba'am/ slar rgol ba'i dge slong mtshan 'phos na/ rtsod pa rnam par zhi ba zhes bgyi'am/
423a6('dul ba): u pa li/ rnam par zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /rtsod pa'i dngos po rdzogs so// //mdor na/ bye 'byed dge 'dun ca co dang / /tha dad pa dang tshul bzhin dang / /bskal pa kha na ma tho log
423a7('dul ba): dge 'dun dbye dang mi mkhas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun bye ba zhes kyang bgyi/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun 'dus pa zhes kyang bgyi na/ btsun pa/ dge 'dun bye ba gang lags/ u pa li/ gang dbyen byed pas
423b1('dul ba): chos ma yin pa la chos ma yin par 'du shes/ 'dul ba ma yin pa la 'dul ba ma yin par 'du shes par gyur bzhin du des 'du shes bcabs/ bzod pa bcabs/ dad pa bcabs/ blo gros dang /
423b2('dul ba): lta ba dang / rtog pa rnams bcabs te 'di skad du/ 'di ni/ chos so/ /'di ni/ 'dul ba'o/ /'di ni/ ston pa'i bstan pa'o/ /zhes smras nas des dge slong dag la bsgo/ yang dag par bsgo/ slob/ len du
423b3('dul ba): 'jug / brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang rjes su bsgrags te/ 'di ltar/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyed cag lag gang dad cing bzod de mos pa de dag gis ni/ tshul shing longs shig /de gang gis brtul zhugs
423b4('dul ba): kyi gnas lnga bsgrags te gsol ba byas/ tshul shing brims te mang po khrid de 'gro ba 'di ni/ dge 'dun bye ba zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun 'dus pa gang zhe na/ dge slong mtshams kyi nang na ji snyed 'khod par gyur
423b5('dul ba): pa de dag las byed pa na/ de dag thams cad 'dus par gyur/ mngon sum du gyur/ dad pa blang bar rigs pa'i rnams las dad pa blangs par gyur/ dge slong rnams kyang 'thab pa med/ rtsod pa med
423b6('dul ba): la/ de dag chos su 'du shes/ 'dul bar 'du shes te gso sbyong gi las byed pa 'di ni/ dge 'dun 'dus pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun 'byed pas bstir med pa'i kha na ma tho ba bskyed la mtshams
423b7('dul ba): med pa'i las su 'gyur ba gang lags/ u pa li/ nam 'byed pas chos ma yin pa la chos ma yin par 'du shes pa yin/ bye ba la'ang chos ma yin par 'du shes bzhin du des 'du shes bcabs/
424a1('dul ba): bzod pa bcabs/ dad pa dang / blo gros dang / lta ba dang / rtog pa rnams bcabs te 'di skad du/ chos ni/ 'di'o/ /'dul ba ni/ 'di'o/ /ston pa'i bstan pa ni/ 'di'o//
424a2('dul ba): zhes smras nas des dge slong dag la bsgo/ yang dag par bsgo/ slob/ len du 'jug/ brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang rjes su bsgrags te gang dbyen byed pa des brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga rjes su bsgrags
424a3('dul ba): te gsol ba byas/ tshul shing brims nas mang po khrid de song ba 'di ni/ dge 'dun 'byed pa yin te/ bstir med pa'i kha na ma tho ba'ang bskyed/ yang dag par bsgo ba blangs shing len du 'jug pas
424a4('dul ba): mtshams med pa'i las su 'ang 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun 'byed pas bstir med pa'i kha na ma tho ba ni/ skye la/ de mtshams med pa'i las su mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ u pa li/ gang dbyen byed pas chos
424a5('dul ba): ma yin pa la chos ma yin par 'du shes par gyur la/ bye ba la ni/ chos su 'du shes pa dang / chos ma yin pa la chos ma yin par 'du shes par gyur la/ bye ba la yang chos ma yin par 'du
424a6('dul ba): shes pa dang / chos ma yin pa la chos ma yin par 'du shes par gyur la/ bye ba la the tshom za ba dang / chos ma yin pa la chos su 'du shes la/ bye ba la chos ma yin par 'du shes pa dang / chos
424a7('dul ba): ma yin pa la chos su 'du shes la/ bye ba la yang chos su 'du shes pa dang / chos ma yin pa la chos su 'du shes la/ bye ba la the tshom du gyur pa dang / chos la chos su 'du shes la/
424b1('dul ba): bye ba la chos ma yin par 'du shes pa dang / chos la chos ma yin par 'du shes la/ bye ba la chos su 'du shes pa dang / chos la chos ma yin par 'du shes la/ bye ba la the tshom du gyur pa dang /

424b4('dul ba): chos su 'du shes pa dang / chos ma yin pa la the tshom du gyur la bye ba la yang the tshom du gyur pa dang / chos la the tshom du gyur la/ bye ba la chos ma yin par 'du shes pa dang / chos la the tshom
424b5('dul ba): du gyur la/ bye ba la chos su 'du shes pa dang / chos la the tshom du gyur la/ bye ba la yang the tshom du gyur pa ste/ des 'du shes bcabs/ bzod pa bcabs/ dad pa bcabs/ blo gros dang / lta ba dang
424b6('dul ba): rtog pa rnams bcabs te 'di skad du/ 'di ni/ chos so/ /'di ni/ 'dul ba'o/ /'di ni/ ston pa'i bstan pa'o/ /zhes smras nas des yang dge slong rnams la bsgo/ yang dag par bsgo/ slob/ len
424b7('dul ba): du 'jug / dge 'dun bye ba'i phyir brtson pa 'di ni/ dge 'dun 'byed par byed pa ste/ bstir med pa'i kha na ma tho ba ni/ skye la/ de mtshams med pa'i las su mi 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gang la la
425a1('dul ba): dge 'dun bye ba de thams cad dge 'dun ca cor 'gyur ram/ dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun ca co med pa yang yod/ dge 'dun ca cor gyur la dge 'dun mi 'bye ba yang yod/
425a2('dul ba): dge 'dun yang bye la dge 'dun ca cor yang 'gyur ba yod/ dge 'dun yang mi 'bye la dge 'dun ca cor yang mi 'gyur ba yod de/ dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun ca co med pa gang zhe na/ gang chos su
425a3('dul ba): 'du shes la dge 'dun 'byed pa'o/ /dge 'dun ca cor gyur la dge 'dun mi bye ba gang zhe na/ dbyen du 'gyur ba'i dngos po bcu bzhi las gang yang rung ste/ dbyen du 'gyur ba'i dngos po zhig shin
425a4('dul ba): tu gdon mi za bar bzung bar gyur la/ dge 'dun ni/ bye bar ma gyur pa'o/ /dge 'dun yang bye la dge 'dun gyi ca cor yang 'gyur pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar dge 'dun de dag bye bar gyur la/ dbyen
425a5('dul ba): du 'gyur ba'i dngos po bcu bzhi las gang yang rung ste/ dbyen du 'gyur ba'i dngos po zhig shin tu gdon mi za bar bzung bar gyur pa'o/ /dge 'dun yang mi 'bye la dge 'dun gyi ca cor yang mi 'gyur
425a6('dul ba): ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ma gtogs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ gang dge 'dun bye ba de thams cad dge 'dun tha dad par gyur pa lags sam/ dge 'dun tha dad par 'gyur la/ dge 'dun mi 'bye ba
425a7('dul ba): yang yod/ /dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun tha dad par mi 'gyur ba yang yod/ dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun tha dad par 'gyur ba yang yod/ dge 'dun mi 'bye la dge 'dun tha dad par mi 'gyur ba yang yod de
425b1('dul ba): dge 'dun tha dad par gyur la dge 'dun mi dbye ba ni/ 'di ltar/ dge 'dun rnam gnyis so so'i gzhi la gnas par gyur/ rnyed pa yang tha dad/ gnas kyang tha dad/ mtshams kyang tha dad par
425b2('dul ba): gyur la/ dge 'dun ni/ ma bye ba'o/ /dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun tha dad par mi 'gyur ba ni/ gang chos su 'du shes pas dge 'dun phye ba'o/ /dge 'dun bye la dge 'dun tha dad pa ni/ 'di ltar
425b3('dul ba): dge 'dun bye bar gyur la/ dge 'dun rnam gnyis so so na gnas par gyur/ rnyed pa tha dad pa dang / gnas tha dad pa dang / mtshams tha dad par gyur pa'o/ /dge 'dun ma bye la dge 'dun tha dad
425b4('dul ba): par yang ma gyur pa ni/ rnam pa de lta bu dag ma gtogs pa'o/ /ji ltar dge 'dun tha dad pa la rnam pa bzhir gyur pa bzhin du dge 'dun gyi tshul la yang rnam pa bzhir brjod par bya'o/ /btsun pa/
425b5('dul ba): gang la las dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa de dag thams cad bskal par gnas sam/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas la bskal par mi gnas pa yang yod/ bskal par gnas la dge 'dun gyi
425b6('dul ba): dbyen ma byas pa'ang yod/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas la bskal par gnas pa'ang yod/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen ma byas la bskal par mi gnas pa yang yod de/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas la
425b7('dul ba): bskal par mi gnas pa ni/ gang gis chos su 'du shes pas dge 'dun phye ba'o/ /bskal par gnas la dge 'dun gyi dbyen ma byas pa ni/ blang po'i rgyal po e ra ba na dang / glang
426a1('dul ba): po'i rgyal po shin tu brtan pa dang / glang po'i rgyal po yid du 'ong ba dang / glang po'i rgyal po gshin rje dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha
426a2('dul ba): rnams so/ /dge 'dun phye la bskal bar gnas pa ni/ lha sbyin no/ /dge 'dun yang ma phye la bskal par yang mi gnas pa ni/ rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ma gtogs pa'o/ /gang la las dge
426a3('dul ba): 'dun phye na/ de dag thams cad bskal par gnas pa'i kha na ma tho ba skye ba yang rnam pa bzhir brjod par bya ste/ de yang de bzhin du dbye bar bya'o/ /gang la la dge 'dun 'byed pa de dag thams
426a4('dul ba): cad log par nges pa lags sam/ dge 'dun 'byed la log par nges pa ma yin pa yang yod/ log par nges la dge 'dun mi 'byed pa'ang yod/ dge 'dun 'byed la log par nges
426a5('dul ba): pa'ang yod/ dge 'dun 'byed pa yang ma yin la log par nges pa ma yin pa'ang yod de/ dge 'dun 'byed la log par nges pa ma yin pa ni/ gang chos su 'du shes shing dge 'dun
426a6('dul ba): 'byed pa'o/ /log par nges la dge 'dun 'byed pa ma yin pa de ni/ mtshams med pa bzhi'o/ /dge 'dun 'byed la log par yang nges pa ni/ lhas byin no/ /dge 'dun 'byed pa'ang ma
426a7('dul ba): yin la log par nges par 'ang ma yin pa ni/ rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ma gtogs pa'o/ /gang la la dge 'dun 'byed pa de dag thams cad mi mkhas pa dang ma rig par gyur pa lags
426b1('dul ba): sam| dge 'dun 'byed la mi mkhas pa ma yin zhing ma rig par gyur pa ma yin pa'ang yod/ mi mkhas pa dang ma rig pa yin la dge 'dun mi 'byed pa'ang yod/ dge 'dun 'byed la mi
426b2('dul ba): mkhas pa dang ma rig par gyur pa'ang yod/ dge 'dun yang mi 'byed la mkhas pa'ang yin ma rig par gyur pa ma yin pa'ang yod de/ dge 'dun 'byed la mi mkhas pa'ang ma yin ma rig par
426b3('dul ba): gyur pa ma yin pa ni/ gang chos su 'du shes pas dge 'dun 'byed pa'o/ /mi mkhas pa dang ma rig par gyur la dge 'dun mi 'byed pa ni/ ston pa drug go /dge 'dun 'byed la mi mkhas pa dang
426b4('dul ba): ma rig pa ni/ lhas byin no/ /dge 'dun yang mi 'byed la mi mkhas pa'ang ma yin/ ma rig par gyur pa'ang ma yin pa ni/ rnam pa 'di dag ma gtogs pa'o/ /mdor na/ phye ba rnam pa drug tu
426b5('dul ba): byas| |rgol ba rnam bzhi gso sbyong dang / /mtshams la rnam bzhi gsum pa dang / /bskal pa brtan min de bzhin te/ /khyim pa dag la sogs pa dang / /bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o/ /btsun pa/ phye ba
426b6('dul ba): dang ldan pa gang lags/ kha na ma tho ba gang lags/ u pa li/ dge 'dun ni/ phye ba dang ldan pa'o/ /'byed pa ni/ kha na ma tho ba'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun phye na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes pa sbom
426b7('dul ba): por 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun phye na/ nongs pa gang bshags par bgyi/ nyes pa sbom po'o/ /btsun pa/ 'di ltar dge slong dag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun 'byed kyi/ dge slong mas ma
427a1('dul ba): lags/ dge slob mas ma lags/ dge tshul mas ma lags/ dge tshul phas ma lags sam/ u pa li/ de bzhin te/ dge slong dag gis dge 'dun 'byed kyi/
427a2('dul ba): dge slong mas ma yin/ dge slob mas ma yin/ dge tshul mas ma yin/ dge tshul phas ma yin no/ /u pa li/ de bzhin du dge slong ma dag gis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'byed kyi/ dge
427a3('dul ba): slong gis ma yin/ dge slob mas ma yin/ dge tshul mas ma yin/ dge tshul phas ma yin te/ 'on kyang dge 'dun 'byed pa'i phyir ni/ rtsol lo/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam
427a4('dul ba): pa gnyis kyi slad du dge 'dun 'byed de/ rjes su bsgrags pa dang / tshul shing len pa'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ gang rtsed mor 'tshal ba'am/ ma 'tshal ba zhig gis rjes su
427a5('dul ba): bsgrags shing tshul shing brims na/ dge 'dun phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /'o na/ cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ /dge 'dun 'byed pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun 'byed
427a6('dul ba): pa na mtshan 'phos na/ dge 'dun phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bye nas phyogs dang / pha rol gyi phyogs su gnas na/ dge slong ma la
427a7('dul ba): zla ba phyed phyed cing bstan pa'i lung stsal tam/ u pa li/ ma sbyin par 'di skad du/ sring mo rnams rjes su mthun par gyis shig /ces sgos shig /btsun pa/ dge slong gi dge
427b1('dul ba): 'dun bye ste phyogs dang / pha rol gyi phyogs su gnas na/ dge slong mas zla ba phyed phyed cing bstan pa'i lung gsol bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ gsol bar bya'o/ /gang las gsol/ rjes su
427b2('dul ba): ma phyogs pa rnams las so/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun bye ste phyogs dang / pha rol gyi phyogs su gnas na/ dge slong ma la bstan pa'i lung stsal bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ dge slong
427b3('dul ba): ma yang bye bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir bas na/ byin cig /btsun pa/ dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bye ste phyogs dang / pha rol gyi phyogs su gnas pa la gang gis dge slong ma la lung stsal bar bgyi/
427b4('dul ba): rjes su ma phyogs pa rnams kyis sbyin no/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun bye ste phyogs dang / pha rol gyi phyogs su gnas na/ dge slong mas gso sbyong bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bya'o/ /btsun pa/

427b6('dul ba): 'dus pa las gso sbyong bya'o/ /btsun pa/ nye bar phyogs pas nye bar ma phyogs pa rnams kyi mtshams bkrol na/ mtshams bkrol ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/
427b7('dul ba): nye bar ma phyogs pa rnams kyis nye bar phyogs pa rnams kyi mtshams bkrol na/ mtshams bkrol ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ bkrol ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ gang la la zhig nye
428a1('dul ba): bar phyogs pa de dag thams cad so sor gnas pa zhes bgyi'am/ rnam pa bzhir rgyas par brjod do/ /btsun pa/ gang la la zhig nye bar phyogs nas de dag thams
428a2('dul ba): cad mi gnas pa zhes bgyi'am/ rnam pa bzhir rgyas par brjod do/ /btsun pa/ gang la la so sor gnas na/ de dag thams cad mi gnas pa zhes bgyi'am/ rnam pa bzhir rgyas par brjod
428a3('dul ba): do/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lcags rnam par brgyar gyes pa'i dum bu yang stsal bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ lcags kyi dum bu zhes bgyi ba gang lags/ dad pa stsal bar bya
428a4('dul ba): ba dang / mos pa stsal bar bya ba dang / 'dun pa stsal bar bya ba dang / dge 'dun 'dus pa stsal bar bya ste/ dge 'dun dbye ba'i phyir ni stsal bar mi bya'o/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun bye ste phyogs

428a6('dul ba): pa li/ ma yin no/ /btsun pa/ de bzhin du dge slong ma sun phyung ba nas bslab pa stsal ba'i bar du rgyas par de dag gis dge 'dun phye na/ dge 'dun phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin

428b1('dul ba): pa dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa rnams kyis dge 'dun phye na/ dge 'dun phye ba zhes bgyi'am/ u pa li/ ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ u pa li/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ma yin pas na/ dge
428b2('dul ba): 'dun dbye bar mi nus so/ /ji ltar dge 'dun 'byed pa de bzhin du grangs su mi 'gyur bar yang brjod par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi dbyen gyi dngos po rdzogs te/ u pa lis zhus pa rdzogs so// //
428b3('dul ba): mdor na/ bzang sbyin rdo rje 'du shes dang / /bal glang mo dang rgod ma dang / /ba dang rnga mo ri dwags mo/ /bong lug khyi phag mo rnams so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer yangs pa can na spre'u
428b4('dul ba): rdzing 'gram gyi khang bu brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ /ka lan+da ka'i bu bzang sbyin la bslab pa'i gnas bcas pas las dang po pa la nyes pa med pa ni/ bdag gis bslab pa ma bcas pa'i tshe lan mang du
428b5('dul ba): mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos byas nas bdag gi las dang po pa gang yin zhes the tshom du gyur nas sems la dogs pa dang / 'gyod pa rnams skyes te/ des de lta bur gyur pa dge slong
428b6('dul ba): rnams la smras nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pa na/ ka lan+da ka'i bu
428b7('dul ba): bzang sbyin gyis shin tu 'das par gyur ba ni/ thams cad kyang las dang po pa yin te/ las dang po pa la ni/ nyes pa med do/ /dge slong rdo rje'i bu zhes bya bas bslab pa ma phul bslab pa nyams
429a1('dul ba): pa ma bshags par khyim par gyur te/ des de na mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos byas nas de 'di snyam du gyur to/ /re zhig dge slong rnams la dris la/ de ste bdag
429a2('dul ba): rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par rung na ni/ rab tu 'byung ngo / /de ste mi rung na/ 'di nyid na 'dug go/ snyam du bsam nas des de ltar gyur pa nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i bar
429a3('dul ba): du rgyas par bya ste/ dge slong dag/ bslab pa ma phul/ bslab pa nyams pa ma bshags par khyim pa'i dngos por gyur te mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos la brten na/ gang zag de slar yang
429a4('dul ba): rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mi rung gi/ de bzhin du bslab pa'i gnas bshad par bya'o/ /yang dge slong gang bslab pa ma phul/ bslab pa nyams pa ma bshags bzhin du mi tshangs par spyod

429a6('dul ba): ste/ bal glang mo de las be'u mo zhig byung ngo / /de'i ma de ni/ zas la song nas dge slong des rtswa blangs te de la rtswa byin/ chu blud pa dang / des de 'dug pa la mo mtshan bye bar mthong ste/ des de

429b1('dul ba): gyur pa dge slong rnams la smras pa nas rgyas par brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /der reg par ma gyur pas phas pham pa'i nyes pa ni/ med kyi/ nyes pa sbom por

429b3('dul ba): la phra ba gcig brgyab nas skrag par gyur te/ bdag la phas pham pa'i ltung ba ma byung grang snyam bsam nas des de lta bur gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

429b6('dul ba): tu bsgrags pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis smyon pa la nongs pa ma mchis so/ /zhes gsungs na/ ji tsam gyis na/ smyon pa zhes bgyi/ rnam pa lngas smyon par 'gyur te/ gnyen bshes
429b7('dul ba): zad pa dang / longs spyod zad pa dang / nor zad pa dang / khams ma mnyam pa dang / mi ma yin pas brlams pa dang / sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ste/ rnam pa 'di lngas smyon par 'gyur ro/ /
430a1('dul ba): de ste dge slong gi dngos por shes na ni/ dngos po ji lta ba bzhin no/ /de ste dge slong gi dngos por mi shes na/ smyon pa la nyes pa med do/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

430a7('dul ba): tshom skyes nas des de ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam la lam ma yin par 'du shes na/ phas pham par 'gyur ro/ /lam la the tshom za bar

430b6('dul ba): sgren mor khrus byed de/ de'i nye g.yog ni/ mi bzhi zhig byed de/ de'i lus la reg pas pho mtshan las su rung bar gyur te 'dod chags kun tu gnas pa dang / dge slong gzhan zhig mdun na 'dug par
430b7('dul ba): gyur pa des de'i pho mtshan bdag gi khar bcug pa dang / des kyang lus btud de khu ba phyung nas dge slong de the tshom skyes nas bdag la phas pham pa'i nyes pa ma byung grang snyam du bsam ste/ des de

431a2('dul ba): 'dug kyang rung gzhan las byed pa bdag gir ma byed cig / dge slong zhig 'dod chags kun tu gnas pas gzir ba dang / de la dge slong mdza' bo zhig yod de/ de de'i drung du song nas des de la/

431a6('dul ba): byung ba lci ba dang / phas pham pa las byung ba yang ba dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma las byung ba lci ba dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma las byung ba yang ba rnams te/ de la u pa li/ gang phas pham pa

432a7('dul ba): dang / dge slong zhig mi ro la brtag pa'i phyir dur khrod du song ba des de mthong nas de la chags pa'i chos skyes te/ des de'i nang du gzhug ces rma khar btsugs pa dang / de'ang langs te 'dug

433a7('dul ba): du| ra ro ba dang / nad kyis gzir ba mi 'dod bzhin pa'o/ /ji ltar bud med la rnam pa bzhir brjod pa skyes pa dang / ma ning la yang de bzhin no// //'dul ba gzhung
433b1('dul ba): dam pa| bam po nyer gnyis pa/ mdor na/ rnam pa bzhi dang lnga pa dang / /lam rnams kun dang gnyid log pa/ /lan gcig gsum pa byas pa dang / /bud med skyes pa ma ning ngo / /dge slong nyal ba la bud
433b2('dul ba): med kyis byas te 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong / khyod kyis ci dga' bar tshor ram/ gsol pa/ dga' ba tshor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

433b4('dul ba): pham pa'i nyes pa med de/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /dge slong zhig nyal ba na bud med kyis byas te/ de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong / khyod kyis ci dga'
433b5('dul ba): ba tshor ram/ gsol pa/ dga' ba ma tshor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' ba ma tshor na/ nyes pa med do/ /dge slong nyal zhing 'dug pa la bud med kyis byas te/ de 'gyod pa skyes
433b6('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong / ci/ khyod kyis shes sam/ gsol pa/ ma 'tshol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa med na/ nyes pa med do/ /
433b7('dul ba): dge slong nyal zhing 'dug pa la bud med kyis byas te 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci/ dge slong khyod kyis shes pa'am/ dga' ba tshor ba yod dam/ gsol pa/

434a2('dul ba): do| |dge slong la ji lta bar dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma dang / dge tshul pha la yang de bzhin no/ /sdig pa can gyi dge sbyong gsum pos bud med bzung ste lam kun tu byas
434a3('dul ba): kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras nas/ de dag gis de'i lam kun tu byas pa dang / de dag the tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcug ma thag tu phas pham par
434a4('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /bud med la ji lta bar skyes pa dang / ma ning thams cad la'ang de bzhin no/ /mdor na/ bud med skyes pa ma ning dang / /sun phyung dga' ba ma tshor dang / /dgon pa gsum dang rab byung
434a5('dul ba): lnga'o/ /dge slong zhig nyal ba la bud med kyis byas te dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong / ci khyod kyis shes sam/ gsol pa/ ma 'tshal
434a6('dul ba): to| |ma shes pa la nyes pa med do/ /bud med la ji lta bar skyes pa dang / ma ning la yang de bzhin no/ /dgon pa'i dge slong sdig can gyis dge slob ma khrid nas khyod ni/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs
434a7('dul ba): pas mi tshangs par spyod na/ bdag cag gnyi ga la nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / des khas blangs so/ /des khas blangs nas 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / des de ma dad bzhin
434b1('dul ba): du byas nas dge slob ma de/ bdag ni/ dge slob ma ma yin par ma gyur grang snyam du 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bslab pa nyams kyi/ slar yang byin cig /nyes byas

434b6('dul ba): pham pa'i nyes pa med de/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /dge slong zhig gis dge slong zhig nyal ba la byas pa dang / dge slong des thog ma dang / bar dang / tha ma rnams ma shes na/ dge slong gang gis
