440b2('dul ba): bzang mo'i gleng gzhi rgyas par byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang mo/ ci khyod kyis dga' ba tshor ram/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dga' ba lta ga la tshor gyi/ ji ltar
440b3('dul ba): thong lcags bsregs pa bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bud med kyi mo mtshan gyi phyogs ni/ las rnam par smin pa las skyes te/ nan gyis byas pa la nyes pa med do/ /
440b4('dul ba): dge slong ma bzang mo skyes zhes bya ba de g.yon can rnams kyis bzung nas kha bkab ste nags stug por khrid nas sun phyung ste slar btang ba las/ dge slong ma dag gis gnas nas bskrad pa dang / des
440b5('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags ma/ bdag gis ni/ dga' ba tshor ro/ /khyod g.yon can gyis bzung ste nags stug por khrid nas sun phyung ste slar btang ba yin na/ ci'i phyir dga' ba ma tshor/ de ltar gyur
440b6('dul ba): pa dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci/ khyod kyis dga' tshor ram/
440b7('dul ba): btsun pa/ bdag 'gres ldog sug pa g.yabs na/ dga' ba lta ga la tshor zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bud med kyi mo mtshan gyi phyogs ni/ las
441a1('dul ba): rnam par smin pa las skyes te/ 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / lag pa g.yob pa la ni/ nan gyis bzung ba zhes bya ste/ nan gyis bzung ba la ni/ nyes pa med do/ /dge slong
441a2('dul ba): ma nor can mo zhes bya ba zhig mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms spyod pa na/ g.yon can rnams kyis bzung ste nags stug por khrid nas sun phyung ste btang ba dang / dge slong ma dag gis gnas nas
441a3('dul ba): bskrad nas/ 'phags ma/ bdag gis dga' ba ma tshor ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / khyod g.yon can rnams kyis bcings te nags stug por khrid nas sun phyung ste btang ba yin na/ ci'i phyir dga'
441a4('dul ba): ba mtshor/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong dag la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci/ khyod
441a5('dul ba): kyis dga' ba tshor ram/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dus nas bos dkrogs te bdag la ma 'dzin cig /ces smras na/ dga' ba lta ga la tshor/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bud med
441a6('dul ba): kyi mo mtshon gyi phyogs ni/ las rnam par smin pa las skyes te/ ngu bzhin pa ni/ nan gyis bzung ba zhes bya'o/ /bos dkrogs nas bdag la ma 'dzin cig /ces smra ba ni/ nan gyis bzung ba zhes
441a7('dul ba): bya ba ste/ nan gyis bzung ba la nyes pa med do/ /dge slong ma pho brang skyong zhes bya ba zhig mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms spyod pa na/ g.yon can rnams kyis bzung ste nags stug por khrid nas
441b1('dul ba): sun phyung ste btang ba la de dge slong ma dag gis kyang gnas nas bskrad pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gis dga' ba ni/ ma tshor ro/ /'on kun dga' bo'i drung du song zhig /ces smras nas de de'i drung du
441b2('dul ba): song ba dang / gnas brtan gyis kyang mthong nas des gus pa'i tshig tu ma smras pa dang / gnas brtan gyis kyang bskrad nas de 'di snyam du/ bdag 'di 'dra bar 'tsho zhing 'dug pa bas/ song la bum
441b3('dul ba): pa bye mas bkad ba mgul du btags te klung a dzir ba tir mchong ngo / /snyam du bsam nas des bum pa bye mas bkang ba mgul du btags ta klung a dzi ra ba tir mchongs pa dang / tha gu ngan pa zhig
441b4('dul ba): pas chad de bying zhing nub pa g.yon can rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis phyung ste bzhag nas nam 'du shes slar rnyed pa dang / de la sun 'byin to/ /dge slong ma dag kyang tshol zhing gnas der lhags
441b5('dul ba): pa dang / de dag gis de la sun 'byin par mthong nas des smras pa/ 'di sngon ni/ dge slong ma yin na/ da dung yang dge slong ma yin nam zhes smras nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la smras pa
441b6('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci/ khyod kyis dga' ba tshor ram/ btsun pa/ 'gres ldog sug pa g.yabs nas bdag la ma 'dzin cig /ces smras na/ dga' ba lta ga
441b7('dul ba): la tshor/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bud med kyi mo mtshan gyi phyogs ni/ las rnam par smin pa las skyes te/ 'gre ba ni/ nan gyis bzung ba zhes bya ba nas bdag
442a1('dul ba): la ma 'dzin cig / ces smra ba ni/ nan gyis bzung ba zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par te/ nan gyis bzung ba la ni/ nyes pa med do/ /mdor na/ nor can dgon par 'du shes
442a2('dul ba): dang / /bsod snyoms bcu dang rkun po bcu/ /gzhan yang sho gam gnas kyi bcu/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs so/ /sngon gyi rdzab dge slong nor can bslab pa'i
442a3('dul ba): gnas ma bcas pas las dang po pa la ni/ nyes pa med de/ bdag gis ni/ shing mang zhig ma byin par blangs te 'ongs na/ gang la bdag las dang po par 'gyur zhes sems la gdung zhing
442a4('dul ba): 'gyod de/ 'gyod par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dang / bslab pa'i gnas ma bcas pas sngon gyi rdza ba dge slong nor can ni/ kun las kyang 'das te
442a5('dul ba): thams cad du las dang po pa yin pas las dang po pa la nyes pa med do/ /dge slong zhig dgon pa la bdag po med pa'i yo byad la bdag po yod par 'du shes nas ma byin par blangs pa
442a6('dul ba): dang / dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag po yod pa la bdag po yod par 'du shes na/ phas pham par 'gyur ro/ /bdag po yod pa la the tshom
442a7('dul ba): du gyur na/ phas pham par 'gyur ro/ /bdag po med pa la bdag po yod par 'du shes na/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /bdag po med pa la bdag po med par 'du shes na/ nyes pa med
442b1('dul ba): do| |dge slong gis bsod snyoms 'bras chan zhig mi dbang bar blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /bsod snyoms
442b2('dul ba): 'bras chan la ji lta ba bzhin du bsod snyoms phye dang phye tshal btsos pa'i bsod snyoms dang / bsod snyoms sha dang / bsod snyoms bag tshos rnams thams cad kyang de bzhin du nyes pa sbom
442b3('dul ba): por 'gyur ro/ /dge slong zhig mgron du ma bos par zan zos pa dang / dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/ nyes byas su 'gyur
442b4('dul ba): ro| |ljongs ko sa lar dge 'dun gyis bshos bgod pa na dge slong gzhi pa zhig grong gzhan du song ba dang / de dang lhan cig spyod pa gnyis shig yod de/ de gnyis kas mkhan po'i zan so sor
442b5('dul ba): mnos pa dang / de gnyis 'di snyam du/ khyod kyis kyang mnos/ kho bos kyang mnos na/ gang gis mi dbang bar blangs mi shes te/ phas pham pa'i nyes par ma gyur grang snyam du bsam pa dang /
442b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blangs pa la nyes pa med de/ gzhan shes par byos shig /ljongs ko sa lar dge 'dun gyis bshos bgod pa na/ dge slong gzhi pa zhig grong gzhan
442b7('dul ba): du song nas dge slong de'i mdza' bo des de'i zan mnos pa dang / de 'ongs nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod kyis kho bo'i zan mnos sam/ smras pa/ mnos so/ /dge slong des ngas ma bcol bar khyod
443a1('dul ba): kyis ci phyir mnos zhes smras pa dang / dge slong 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ ma bcol bar ni/ ma nod cig /ljongs
443a2('dul ba): ko sa lar dge 'dun gyi bshos bgod pa na/ dge slong nad pa zhig yod de/ de'i nad g.yog gis zan mnos te/ des mnos nas song ba dang / dge slong de'ang dus 'das nas des ji ltar bya ba mi
443a3('dul ba): shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste sngar dus las 'das la/ phyis mnos na ni/ de nyid du slar phul cig /'on te sngar mnos la phyis dus las 'das na/ yo byad gzhan
443a4('dul ba): ji lta ba de ltar byos shig / dge slong zhig gis dge slong zhig la 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa/ tshur shog /rkun po la 'dong ngo / /zhes smras nas de gnyis dong ste lam gyi phyed du phyin pa dang /
443a5('dul ba): bdag cag ni/ dge bar gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bas rkun po byas na ni/ bdag cag gnyis mi mdzes shing mi rigs so/ /snyam ste ngo tsha ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur nas de gnyis
443a6('dul ba): der ma dong ba dang / de gnyis 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /de dge slong zhig gis dge slong dag cig la tshe
443a7('dul ba): dang ldan pa dag / tshur shog /rkun po la 'dong zhes de skad smras pa dang / de dag dong nas lam gyi phyed du phyin pa dang / bdag cag ni/ mi mdzes so/ /snyam nas ngo tsha ba'i chos dang ldan par
443b1('dul ba): gyur te de der ma dong ba dang / dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /de dag bzhin du byas pa las gcig
443b2('dul ba): ni/ ngo tsha ba'i chos dang ldan nas de 'di snyam du/ de ste ma song na ni/ de dag gis bdag 'tsho ba dang phral bar 'gyur gyi/ bdag song la bdag gis ma byin par mi blang zhing bdag gi skal ba mi bkur ro/ /
443b3('dul ba): snyam du bsam nas des der ma byin par ma blangs/ skal pa yang ma khyer ba dang / dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas pham bzhi nyes pa med de/ nyes byas su
443b4('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag gis dge slong dag la tshe dang ldan pa/ tshur shog /rkun po la 'dong ngo / /zhes smras nas de dag der dong ba dang / de dag las/ phyed ni/ las byed/ phyed ni/ lam srung ngo / /de dag
443b5('dul ba): las lam srung ba gang yin pa de dag 'di snyam du/ bdag cag gis ni/ ma blangs shing / ma brkus pas nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /snyam du bsam pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas
443b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste dngos po tshang na/ phas pham par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po ma tshang na/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /dge slong
443b7('dul ba): zhig gis dge slong zhig la tshe dang ldan pa/ tshur shog /rkun po la 'dong ngo / /zhes smras nas de dag gis ma byin par blangs pa dang / gzhan du ni/ dngos po ma tshang gi/ de gnyis kyis gang
444a1('dul ba): nas blangs pa de nyid du dngos po tshang nas dge slong de gnyis 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gang nas bskyod pa de'i rin thang
444a2('dul ba): brtsi bar bya'o/ /dge slong zhig gis dge slong dag cig la tshe dang ldan pa dag /tshur shog /rkun po la 'dong ngo / /gang gis ci thob pa de de nyid dbang ngo / /zhes smras nas de dag der dong ba dang / de dag
444a3('dul ba): las kha cig gis ni/ thob/ kha cig gis ni/ ma thob nas de dag 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa'i nyes pa med de/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//
444a4('dul ba): dge slong de dag la rkun pos kyang byin/ thun mong ba dang / srung ba dag gis kyang byin na/ de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rjes su
444a5('dul ba): gnang ba ni/ sbyin par byed pa la sbyin bdag tu sems nye bar bzhag ste longs shig /dge slong zhig gi lhan cig spyod pa de rkun pos khrid pa dang / de de nas bos te 'ongs nas dge slong de
444a6('dul ba): 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong bdag nyid kyis bdag rkur rung gi /nyes pa med do/ /dge slong zhig la sho gam bcad pa'i rdzas shig lag
444a7('dul ba): na yod na/ de ste sho gam gyi gnas las 'das na ni/ phas pham par 'gyur ro/ /de 'di snyam du/ 'di ni/ bdag gi ma'i 'o/ /'di ni/ bdag gi pha'i 'o/ /'di ni/ bdag gi phu bo'i 'o/ /
444b1('dul ba): 'di ni/ bdag gi sring mo dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / mchod rten dang / dge 'dun rnams kyi'o/ /snyam du bsam nas mang po la bsngos te 'das na/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /nam
444b2('dul ba): mkha' las 'das na ni/ nyes pa med do/ /mdor na/ khri'u dang glegs bam seng ras dang / /chang dang sha dang gos dang nang / /phyag dar khrod dang dur khrod dang / /dur khrod kyi ni gnas gnyis so/ /dge slong
444b3('dul ba): zhig gis khri'u zhig brnyas nas khyer te 'ongs nas des slar mi sbyin no/ /snyam du bsam pa dang / dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa'i nyes pa
444b4('dul ba): med de| nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /dge slong zhig gis glegs bam zhig brnyas nas khyer te 'ongs pa dang / de yang rgyas par de bzhin no/ /dge slong zhig gis seng ras shig ma byin par blangs
444b5('dul ba): te| des de brkus nas bshig pa dang / de'i nang nas dar rin thang chen po zhig byung ste/ dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ seng ras kyi rin thang brtsi bar
444b6('dul ba): bya'o| |rkun po dag gis chang zhig khyer te dgon pa la dong nas chang kha cig ni/ 'thungs/ kha cig ni/ sbas te dong ba dang / dge slong dag kyang gnas der nyin par spyod pa'i phyir dong pa dang / de dag
444b7('dul ba): gis de mthong nas de dag gis tshwar 'gyur gyi/ song la gtsug lag khang du skyol cing / ces smras nas/ de gtsug lag khang du bskyal to/ /rkun po dag kyang skom nas der song ste btsal ba
445a1('dul ba): dang / ma rnyed nas de dag gis dge slong de dag mthong ste de dag la btsun pa/ kye khyed kyis chang zhig ma bsnams sam zhes dris pa dang / dge slong de dag gis khyer
445a2('dul ba): ro| |zhes smras pa dang / rkun pos btsun pa/ kho bo cag gi chang brkus pas khyed ni/ rkun ma'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
445a3('dul ba): nyes pa med de/ bdag po yod dam med shin tu brtags la blang bar bya'o/ /de ltar sha la'ang de bzhin no/ /rkun pos grong bcom nas ram mdar bsnyegs pa dang / gtsug lag khang du phyin
445a4('dul ba): te de dag skrag pas gtsug lag khang du song nas gos kyang dge slong dag la phul nas dgon pa la bros pa dang / khyim bdag de dag gis gtsug lag khang de bskor nas de dag gtsug lag khang
445a5('dul ba): du dong ba dang de dag gis dge slong dag gi lag pa na gos de dag 'dug par mthong nas de dag gis gos 'di ni/ bdag cag gi'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / dge slong de dag gis kho bo cag la rkun pos
445a6('dul ba): byin no| |zhes smras pa dang / dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ rkun pos brkus nas bstab pa'i nor ma len cig /'on te rkun
445a7('dul ba): po rgyal mtshan can zhig gis byin na ni/ de las blangs par byos la/ gos gris dros la kha dog bsgyur te chongs shig /de kha dog bsgyur kyang slar slong na/ de'ang byin cig /btso blag
445b1('dul ba): mkhan zhig gis gos thal chu'i nang du bcug pa dang / des brjed de grong du song ngo / /des yang gos dran par gyur nas de slar log ste song ba dang / dge slong zhig kyang phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol
445b2('dul ba): zhing gnas der phyin nas de gos de mthong ste dge slong des gos de blangs nas song ba dang / btso blag mkhan des mthong nas btsun pa/ gos ma brku zhes smras pa dang / dge slong gis kho bo phyag dar
445b3('dul ba): khrod kyi gos tshol ba las 'di mthong na/ khyod la 'di cir dgos zhes smras pa dang / btso blag mkhan gyis btsun pa/ kho bos gos 'di thal skyor bcug pa las brjed de/ 'di ni/ bdag gi gos
445b4('dul ba): lags kyi/ ma brku zhig /khyod kyis ni/ ma byin par blangs so/ /zhes smras pa dang / dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ bdag po gzhan yod
445b5('dul ba): dam med shin tu brtags la blang bar bya'o/ /btso blag mkhan gyis gos shig bkrus te shing drung du 'dug pa dang / phyag dar khrod pa zhig phyag dar khrod pa'i gos tshol zhing gnas der phyin te/ des
445b6('dul ba): gos de mthong nas gos de blangs te song ba dang / btso blag mkhan des mthong nas btsun pa/ 'di ni/ bdag gis gos lags kyi/ ma brku zhig /ces smras pa dang / de ste khyod kyi yin na/ slar
445b7('dul ba): khyer cig / dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin tu brtag par bya ba rgyas par ro/ /khyim bdag cig gis gos bzhag ste bshang ba byed pa dang / phyag
446a1('dul ba): dar khrod pa zhig phyag dar khrod pa'i gos tshol zhing gnas der phyin pa des mthong nas des de khyer te song ba dang / khyim bdag de'ang langs te btsun
446a2('dul ba): pa/ 'di ni/ bdag gi bgo ba lags kyi/ ma brku zhig /ces smras pa dang / de ste khyod kyi yin na/ slar khyer cig /dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
446a3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ shin tu rtogs la khyer cig /dze ta'i tshal nas shin tu mi ring ba zhig na zhing rmed pa'i las byed pa zhig gos rnams bzhag ste zhing rmed
446a4('dul ba): pa dang / dge slong phyag dar khrod pa zhig phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol zhing gnas der phyin te des gos de mthong nas des gos de khyer te song ba dang / zhing rmed pa'i las byed pa des
446a5('dul ba): mthong nas btsun pa/ gos ma brku zhig /ces smras pa dang / des de la ma nyan pa dang / des kyang brgyugs te bzung nas btsun pa/ rigs sam/ gos de ma byin par ma blang
446a6('dul ba): zhig / 'di ni/ kho bo phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol ba na mthong ste khyod la 'di cir dgos/ btsun pa/ gos 'di bzhag nas bdag zhing rmed rmed de/ gos 'di ni/ bdag
446a7('dul ba): gi'o/ /zhes smras nas de ste khyod kyi yin na/ slar khyer cig /dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ shin tu brtags par
446b1('dul ba): bgyis te longs shig / khyim bdag cig gis dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams ni/ ltung ba'i gos rnams phyar dar gyi gos so/ /zhes khyer ro/ /zhes thos pa dang / des res rin che ba
446b2('dul ba): zhig la kaR+sha pa Na brgyad phur pa phur te phyag dar spungs pa'i khrod du brkos nas sbas te kha tshar tsam zhig snang bar byas te song ba dang / dge slong zhig phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol zhing gnas
446b3('dul ba): der phyin te/ des kha tshar mthong nas des de nas drangs te khyer ba dang / khyim bdag des mthong nas btsun pa/ ras ma brku zhig /ces smras pa dang / dge slong gis/ ngas 'di ni/
446b4('dul ba): phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol ba las rnyed na/ de khyod la cir dgos zhes smras pa dang / btsun pa/ bdag gis ni/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyis ltung ba'i gos gang rnyed pa de/ phyag dar
446b5('dul ba): khrod pa'o/ /zhes te khyer ro/ /zhes thos nas bdag gis ras la kaR+sha pa Na brgyad phur pa phur te phyag dar spungs par sbas pa'o/ /dge slong des kaR+sha pa Na brgyad po de mthong nas de ste khyod
446b6('dul ba): kyi yin na/ khyer cig /ces smras nas dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ shin tu brtags la bkur bar bya'o/ /khyim bdag
446b7('dul ba): gi khye'u zhig gis srang du gos bzhag ste rtsed mo rtse'o/ /de rtses nas khyim du song ba dang / dge slong zhig phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol zhing gnas der 'ongs pa dang / des gos de mthong nas
447a1('dul ba): des de blangs te song ba dang / bud med cig kyang khyim de nas byung ste des kyang dge slong de mthong nas btsun pa/ gos ma brku zhig /ces smras pa dang / 'di
447a2('dul ba): ni/ kho bos phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol ba na rnyed do/ /btsun pa/ kho mo'i khye'u rtse ba na gos brjed de khyim du mchis so/ /zhes smras pa dang / de ste khyod kyi yin na/ khyer cig /dge
447a3('dul ba): slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin tu brtags la blang bar byos shig /dge slong zhig gis phyag dar khrod pa'i gos sbas te mnyan du yod par
447a4('dul ba): bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / dge slong gzhan zhig kyang phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol zhing gnas der phyin nas des de mthong ste bkrus pa dang / dge slong des kyang phyag dar khrod
447a5('dul ba): kyi gos btsal na ma rnyed nas des dge slong de 'khru ba mthong nas/ des tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod la ni/ phas pham pa'i nyes pa byung ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / ci'i phyir/ kho bo'i phyag dar
447a6('dul ba): khrod kyi gos 'di ma byin par blangs pa'i phyir ro/ /'di la ni/ bdag po yod par kho bos ma shes so/ /zhes smras pa dang / dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan
447a7('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyes pa med de/ shin tu brtags la blang bar gyis shig /dge slong de dag gis kyang mi gtsang bas reg pa'i phyag dar khrod kyi gos bcangs
447b1('dul ba): pa dang / lha phran rnams 'phya nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyag dar khrod kyi gos ni/ shin tu bkrus te legs par btsems la bcang bar bya yi/ dge slong dag gis mi
447b2('dul ba): gtsang bas reg pa'i phyag dar khrod kyi gos ma 'chang zhig / 'chang ba gang yin pa de ni/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro/ /dge slong de dag gis bdag po yod pa'i dur khrod nas gos blangs
447b3('dul ba): pa dang / rigs ngan rnams kyis gang cung zad bdag cag gis las su bya ba thams cad 'di dag gi phyir byed na/ 'di nas gos ma brku zhig /ces de skad mi snyan par smra ba dang / bcom
447b4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag po dang bcas pa'i dur khrod nas gos ma len cig /blangs na/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod nas shin tu mi ring ba zhig na log
447b5('dul ba): pa'i lha khang zhig yod de/ de nas ras shig rlung gis khyer nas dur khrod du lhung ba dang / dge slong zhig phyag dar khrod kyi gos tshol zhing dur khrod du 'ongs pa des ras de rnyed nas
447b6('dul ba): de blangs te khyer ba dang / log pa'i lha khang na gnas pa de dag gis mthong nas btsun pa/ bdag gi ras 'di log pa'i lha khang nas dur khrod du lhung ba yin gyi/ ras 'di
447b7('dul ba): ma brku zhig / ces smras pa dang / de ste khyod kyi yin na/ slar khyer cig /dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag po gzhan
448a1('dul ba): yod med shin tu rtogs la longs shig/ / //sarba mang+ga laM// //
448b1('dul ba): empty page
